title: 「End User Registration」
body:
### Who is using Apache HertzBeat？  

Thank you very much for your attention and support to hertzbeat. This is the biggest motivation for us to move forward.      

### The original intention of this issue

- Learn more about the practical use scenarios of hertzbeat and listen to the community to make hertzbeat better.    
- We want to attract more partners to contribute to hertzbeat.  

### We look forward to your registration      

You can refer to the below:    

````
Organization: TanCloud
Location: On the Moon
Contact: who@outlook.com
Purpose: xxxxx
````

### Thanks again for your participation!

title: NA
body:
Organization: TanCloud https://tancloud.io 
Location: On the Moon
Contact: who@outlook.com
Purpose: HertzBeat, Make Monitoring Easier!

body:
Registration  from ISSUE #136 
组织：武汉各大高校
地点：武汉，中国
联系方式： by02999@163.com
使用场景：所有功能都会用到。主要用于监控学校的数据中心
使用感受：很高兴能在github上看到如此优秀的开源监控产品，业务监控是我工作的一部分，我也有使用其他产品（如开源的zabbix和一些其他厂商的付费产品），与其他产品相比较，感觉hertbeat的优势时使用直观方便，但可能是刚开发没多久，功能可能不如一些老牌产品强大。期待后续更新。: )

Registration from ISSUE #136
Organization: major universities in Wuhan
Location: Wuhan, China
Contact: by02999@163.com
Usage scenarios: All functions will be used. Mainly used to monitor the school's data center
Usage experience: I am very happy to see such excellent open source monitoring products on github. Business monitoring is part of my work. I also use other products (such as open source zabbix and some other paid products from other manufacturers) to compare with other products , when you feel the advantages of hertbeat, it is intuitive and convenient to use, but it may not be long after it has been developed, and its functions may not be as powerful as some old-fashioned products. Looking forward to subsequent updates. : )

body:
本地启动：前端web-app项目报错问题解决
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19964956/180696710-c8b48304-325d-4e4e-8e36-9028e386c19e.png)

解决方案：删掉已经下载的date-fns包，再package.json 里固定版本 "date-fns": "2.28.0"

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19964956/180696710-c8b48304-325d-4e4e-8e36-9028e386c19e.png)

Solution: Delete the downloaded date-fns package and fix the version in package.json "date-fns": "2.28.0"

### 采集指标

#### 指标集合：basic

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| database_version     | 无 | 数据库版本 |
| database_type        | 无 | 数据库类型 |
| hostname             | 无 | 主机名称 |
| instance_name        | 无 | 数据库实例名称 |
| startup_time         | 无 | 数据库启动时间 |
| status               | 无 | 数据库状态 |

#### 指标集合：tablespace

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| file_id           | 无 | 文件ID |
| file_name         | 无 | 文件名称 |
| tablespace_name   | 无 | 所属表空间名称 |
| status            | 无 | 状态 |
| bytes             | MB | 大小 |
| blocks            | 无 | 区块数量 |

#### 指标集合：user_connect

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| username         | 无   | 用户名 |
| counts           | 个数 | 当前连接数量 | 

#### 指标集合：performance

| 指标名称     | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| qps         | QPS | I/O Requests per Second 每秒IO请求数量 |
| tps         | TPS | User Transaction Per Sec 每秒用户事物处理数量 | 
| mbps        | MBPS | I/O Megabytes per Second 每秒 I/O 兆字节数量 |

title: 标签扩展
body:
下载本地体验了一下，还是挺不错的～本人很喜欢 👍

macOS 貌似使用 docker 算是比较好的方案， 除了 **TDengine** 我都在本地运行～
**TDengine** 不用 docker ，说实话，我在本地 macOS 环境貌似无法运行。
最终我把 TDengine 搭建在了我的私人服务器上，才得以完美运行。

建议：
关于监控维护列表里，能增加标签类的设置和过滤功能嘛？有时候一台服务器往往会部署多台应用什么的，不同的应用不同的端口～ 🥺

当然了，也能增加上其他一些查询过滤条件，比如 监控 Host、监控名称、端口 这样的条件～

### 采集指标

#### 指标集合：basic

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| hostname        | 无 | 主机名称 |
| version         | 无 | 操作系统版本 |
| uptime          | 无 | 系统运行时间 |

#### 指标集合：cpu

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| info           | 无 | CPU型号 |
| cores          | 核数 | CPU内核数量 |
| interrupt      | 个数 | CPU中断数量 |
| load           | 无 | CPU最近1/5/15分钟的平均负载 |
| context_switch | 个数 | 当前上下文切换数量 |


#### 指标集合：memory

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| total         | Mb | 总内存容量 |
| used          | Mb | 用户程序内存量 |
| free          | Mb | 空闲内存容量 |

| available     | Mb | 剩余可用内存容 |   

#### 指标集合：disk

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |

| block_read     | 块数 | 从磁盘读出的块数 |  
| write_rate     | iops | 每秒写磁盘块的速率 |   

#### 指标集合：interface

| 指标名称      | 指标单位 | 指标帮助描述 |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- |
| interface_name         | 无 | 网卡名称 |

| transmit_bytes         | byte | 出站数据流量(bytes)  |

title: [alerter]告警转发支持指定监控类型，告警级别
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
目前告警转发是直接转发所有触发告警，常见情况是需要将指定某些告警信息转发给指定接收人。     

**Describe the solution you'd like**
我们需要在告警转发时，支持选择配置指定转发哪些监控类型的告警，和哪个告警级别的告警信息。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently, alarm forwarding is to directly forward all triggered alarms. In a common situation, certain alarm information needs to be forwarded to a designated recipient.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
We need to support the selection and configuration of alarms that specify which monitoring types to forward and which alarm severity alarm information to forward when alarms are forwarded.

title: [script]window环境bat启动停止服务脚本
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**   
提供Windows环境下使用.bat脚本对hertzbeat服务进行启动和停止。     

**Describe the solution you'd like**
需要编写对应的启动脚本startup.bat 停止脚本 shutdown.bat       
脚本需要考虑到端口占用和服务是否已经启动停止状态      
位于 `script/assembly/server/bin` 目录下

title: NA
body:
hi 这个需要考虑下   
目前支持指标集合下的所有指标自定义组合告警  比如Linux的memory内存下面的 total-总内存 free-空闲内存 `total>432432&&free>=234343` 这种阈值表达式配置。
但是不支持跨指标集合的阈值表达式组合，比如cpu指标集合下面的指标和memory下面的指标。  
这种跨集合的指标目前没找到好的计算关联方式，因为它们不是同一时刻采集的。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi this needs to be considered
Currently, all indicators under the indicator set are supported for custom combination alarms. For example, the threshold expression configuration of total-total memory free-free memory `total>432432&&free>=234343` under the Linux memory memory.
However, it does not support the combination of threshold expressions across indicator sets, such as the indicators below the cpu indicator set and the indicators below the memory.
This kind of cross-collection indicators have not found a good way to calculate the correlation, because they are not collected at the same time.

大量监控如果手动在页面上配置添加会很麻烦

此需求目前看工作量较大，需要考虑 自动扫描，监控参数配置，对端应用默认端口关联，自动新增，监控重复判断规则等。

title: 希望可以自动建立运维采集最小权限的账号
body:
在运维管理规范的企业中，是不允许root账户远程直接登录采集的。而像一些数据库，比如Oracle，非root需要逐个对相关表或视图赋权后才可以执行系统级别查询。类似的linux会因为环境量和用户组拒绝执行一些指令。而指令增多后，不仅要排查问题是哪个语句出问题，还要联系运维人员赋权添加权限。
希望初始化的时候录入root账号，选择自动的建立或赋权，采集账号各类权限，系统不保存root用户的信息。
并且改写采集规则时候，需要后续继续赋权。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
In enterprises with standardized operation and maintenance management, the root account is not allowed to log in directly to collect data. And like some databases, such as Oracle, non-root needs to be able to perform system-level queries after granting the relevant tables or views one by one. Similar linux will refuse to execute some commands because of environment volume and user group. After the number of commands increases, not only should you check which statement is the problem, but also contact the operation and maintenance personnel to empower them to add permissions.
You want to enter the root account during initialization, select automatic establishment or authorization, and collect various permissions of the account. The system does not save the information of the root user.
And when the collection rules are rewritten, subsequent empowerment is required.

title: NA
NA
body:
> 有没有办法创建只有访客权限的账户？文档中提到的role1、role2，没能理解这些角色的意义
@gcdd1993 理论上是可以的，已有用户根据sureness.yml配置角色与URL接口资源的权限关系，来建立出访客权限的账户

```
# 加载到匹配字典的资源,也就是需要被保护的,设置了所支持角色访问的资源
# 没有配置的资源也默认被认证保护,但不鉴权
# eg: /api/v1/source1===get===[role2] 表示 /api/v2/host===post 这条资源支持 role2 这一种角色访问
# eg: /api/v1/source2===get===[] 表示 /api/v1/source2===get 这条资源不支持任何角色访问
resourceRole:
  - /account/auth/refresh===post===[role1,role2,role3,role4]

# 用户账户信息
# 下面有 admin tom lili 三个账户
# eg: admin 拥有[role1,role2]角色,密码为admin
# eg: tom 拥有[role1,role2,role3],密码为tom@123
# eg: lili 拥有[role1,role2],明文密码为lili, 加盐密码为1A676730B0C7F54654B0E09184448289
account:
  - appId: admin
    credential: admin
    role: [role1,role2]
```
sureness.yml的配置中 resourceRole 就是配置后台资源URL接口与角色的映射关系，这样就可以把查询新增删除修改的操作接口给role1，查询接口给role2，用户账户那里用户tom 就只配role2角色 就代表tom用户只拥有访客查询权限

目前是这样配置解决 后期看出下教程优化下前端无权限时显示

title: NA
body:
@tomsun28 嗯，找到文档了，是您的另一个项目：https://github.com/dromara/sureness
顺便提供下我的访客配置
```yml
## -- sureness.yml文本数据源 -- ##

# 加载到匹配字典的资源,也就是需要被保护的,设置了所支持角色访问的资源
# 没有配置的资源也默认被认证保护,但不鉴权
# eg: /api/v1/source1===get===[role2] 表示 /api/v2/host===post 这条资源支持 role2 这一种角色访问
# eg: /api/v1/source2===get===[] 表示 /api/v1/source2===get 这条资源不支持任何角色访问
resourceRole:
  - /account/auth/refresh===get,post===[admin,visitor]
  - /apps/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /monitor/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /monitor/**===post===[admin]
  - /monitor/**===put===[admin]
  - /monitor/**===delete==[admin]
  - /monitors/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /monitors/**===post===[admin]
  - /monitors/**===put===[admin]
  - /monitors/**===delete===[admin]
  - /notice/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /notice/**===post===[admin]
  - /notice/**===put===[admin]
  - /notice/**===delete===[admin]
  - /summary/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /summary/**===post===[admin]
  - /summary/**===put===[admin]
  - /summary/**===delete===[admin]

# 需要被过滤保护的资源,不认证鉴权直接访问
# /api/v1/source3===get 表示 /api/v1/source3===get 可以被任何人访问 无需登录认证鉴权
excludedResource:
  - /account/auth/**===*
  - /===get
  - /i18n/**===get
  - /apps/hierarchy===get
  # web ui 静态资源
  - /console/**===get
  - /**/*.html===get
  - /**/*.js===get
  - /**/*.css===get
  - /**/*.ico===get
  - /**/*.ttf===get
  - /**/*.png===get
  - /**/*.gif===get
    - /**/*.png===*
  # swagger ui 资源
  - /swagger-resources/**===get
  - /v2/api-docs===get
  - /v3/api-docs===get

# 用户账户信息
# 下面有 admin tom lili 三个账户
# eg: admin 拥有[role1,role2]角色,密码为admin
# eg: tom 拥有[role1,role2,role3],密码为tom@123
# eg: lili 拥有[role1,role2],明文密码为lili, 加盐密码为1A676730B0C7F54654B0E09184448289
account:
  - appId: admin
    credential: xxx
    role: [ admin ]
  - appId: visitor
    credential: xxx
    role: [ visitor ]
```

````yml
## -- sureness.yml text data source -- ##

# Load the resource that matches the dictionary, that is, the resource that needs to be protected, and the resource that supports the role access is set
# Unconfigured resources are also protected by authentication by default, but not authenticated
# eg: /api/v1/source1===get===[role2] means /api/v2/host===post this resource supports role2 access
# eg: /api/v1/source2===get===[] means /api/v1/source2===get This resource does not support any role access
resourceRole:
  - /account/auth/refresh===get,post===[admin,visitor]
  - /apps/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /monitor/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /monitor/**===post===[admin]
  - /monitor/**===put===[admin]
  - /monitor/**===delete==[admin]
  - /monitors/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /monitors/**===post===[admin]
  - /monitors/**===put===[admin]
  - /monitors/**===delete===[admin]
  - /notice/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /notice/**===post===[admin]
  - /notice/**===put===[admin]
  - /notice/**===delete===[admin]
  - /summary/**===get===[admin,visitor]
  - /summary/**===post===[admin]
  - /summary/**===put===[admin]
  - /summary/**===delete===[admin]

# Resource that needs to be protected by filtering, directly access without authentication
# /api/v1/source3===get means /api/v1/source3===get can be accessed by anyone without login authentication
excludedResource:
  - /account/auth/**===*
  - /===get
  - /i18n/**===get
  - /apps/hierarchy===get
  # web ui static resources
  - /console/**===get
  - /**/*.html===get
  - /**/*.js===get
  - /**/*.css===get
  - /**/*.ico===get
  - /**/*.ttf===get
  - /**/*.png===get
  - /**/*.gif===get
    - /**/*.png===*
  # swagger ui resources
  - /swagger-resources/**===get
  - /v2/api-docs===get
  - /v3/api-docs===get

# User account information
# There are three accounts of admin tom lili below
# eg: admin has the role of [role1,role2], the password is admin
# eg: tom has [role1,role2,role3], the password is tom@123
# eg: lili has [role1,role2], the plaintext password is lili, and the salted password is 1A676730B0C7F54654B0E09184448289
account:
  - appId: admin
    credential: xxx
    role: [ admin ]
  - appId: visitor
    credential: xxx
    role: [ visitor ]
````

body:
hi 这个问题一般是没有正确配置sureness.yml 请排查是否是对sureness.yml没有配置完整
 [注意⚠️sureness配置的其它默认参数需保留]

配置用户配置文件(非必须,配置账户需要)
HertzBeat默认内置三个用户账户,分别为 admin/admin tom/tom@123 lili/lili
若需要新增删除修改账户或密码，可以通过配置 sureness.yml 实现，若无此需求可忽略此步骤
在主机目录下创建sureness.yml，eg:/opt/sureness.yml
配置文件内容参考 项目仓库[/script/sureness.yml](https://gitee.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/script/sureness.yml)
修改sureness.yml的如下部分参数：[注意⚠️sureness配置的其它默认参数需保留]

```
## -- sureness.yml文本数据源 -- ##

# 加载到匹配字典的资源,也就是需要被保护的,设置了所支持角色访问的资源
# 没有配置的资源也默认被认证保护,但不鉴权
# eg: /api/v1/source1===get===[role2] 表示 /api/v2/host===post 这条资源支持 role2 这一种角色访问
# eg: /api/v1/source2===get===[] 表示 /api/v1/source2===get 这条资源不支持任何角色访问
resourceRole:
  - /account/auth/refresh===post===[role1,role2,role3,role4]

# 需要被过滤保护的资源,不认证鉴权直接访问
# /api/v1/source3===get 表示 /api/v1/source3===get 可以被任何人访问 无需登录认证鉴权
excludedResource:
  - /account/auth/**===*
  - /===get
  - /i18n/**===get
  - /apps/hierarchy===get
  # web ui 静态资源
  - /console/**===get
  - /**/*.html===get
  - /**/*.js===get
  - /**/*.css===get
  - /**/*.ico===get
  - /**/*.ttf===get
  - /**/*.png===get
  - /**/*.gif===get
    - /**/*.png===*
  # swagger ui 资源
  - /swagger-resources/**===get
  - /v2/api-docs===get
  - /v3/api-docs===get

# 用户账户信息
# 下面有 admin tom lili 三个账户
# eg: admin 拥有[role1,role2]角色,密码为admin
# eg: tom 拥有[role1,role2,role3],密码为tom@123
# eg: lili 拥有[role1,role2],明文密码为lili, 加盐密码为1A676730B0C7F54654B0E09184448289
account:
  - appId: admin
    credential: admin
    role: [role1,role2]
  - appId: tom
    credential: tom@123
    role: [role1,role2,role3]
  - appId: lili
    # 注意 Digest认证不支持加盐加密的密码账户
    # 加盐加密的密码，通过 MD5(password+salt)计算
    # 此账户的原始密码为 lili
    credential: 1A676730B0C7F54654B0E09184448289
    salt: 123
    role: [role1,role2]
```

title: 升级脚本
body:
随着版本一次次升级，新增特性功能、Bug 修复等，涉及到数据库表的调整时，能一并提供数据库表的升级脚本，像我之前刚开始使用，觉得不错，维护了大量监控数据，现在咱们的数据库表结构有变化，我需要手动迁移数据，挺费时间的。

每次数据库调整时，能一并提供数据库与上一次的变化，虽然我可以将当前的数据库表结构导出，与新的数据库脚本对比，但是导出后顺序也不一样，最终还是要从提交记录上找到之前的，也挺费时间。

如果能在一并**提供数据库与上一次的变化**的同时，也一并**提供旧数据迁移的脚本**，会更好！

> 假如新数据表字段是必填等信息，可以给予默认值，当然的，我们也可以自行更改默认值！

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
As the version is upgraded again and again, new features and functions, bug fixes, etc., when it comes to the adjustment of the database table, the upgrade script of the database table can be provided together. Like I just started using it before, I feel good, and maintain a large amount of monitoring data. Now that our database table structure has changed, I need to manually migrate the data, which is very time-consuming.

Every time the database is adjusted, it can provide the changes of the database and the last time. Although I can export the current database table structure and compare it with the new database script, the order after the export is also different. In the end, it is still necessary to submit the records. It takes time to find the previous ones.

It would be even better if you could **provide the database and the last changes** and also provide the script for the migration of the old data!

> If the new data table field is required and other information, you can give the default value, of course, we can also change the default value by ourselves!

title: NA
body:
Hi 感谢反馈 这个问题确实应该重视起来，目前最近的两个版本没有mysql对应的关系表结构变更，但是因为指标的修改新增，对应TDengine的表结构可能会发生变化，它的表是有数据时自动创建的，这块确实没有考虑周到，tdengine会影响历史图表数据展示。
后面我们研究下指标表这块的升级问题。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
Hi thanks for the feedback. This issue should really be taken seriously. Currently, there is no relational table structure change corresponding to mysql in the recent two versions, but due to the modification and addition of indicators, the table structure corresponding to TDengine may change. Automatically created, this piece is really not thoughtful, tdengine will affect the display of historical chart data.
Later, we will study the upgrade of the indicator table.

title: 希望有分组/tag功能
body:
作为APM希望可以把不同的项目通过分组/tag汇总起来。
例如一个项目既有http监控，也有ping监控，也有tcp监控；这个项目任何一个服务出问题就可以通知某个人。
另外所有的项目最好都加上个说明字段，以便监控人员知道这个是干什么用的。

title: NA
body:

----    
As an APM, I hope that different projects can be aggregated by grouping/tag.
For example, a project has both http monitoring, ping monitoring, and tcp monitoring; any service problem in this project can notify someone.
In addition, it is best to add a description field to all items so that the monitoring personnel know what this is for.

title: 系统时间存在13个小时的时差
body:
tdengine安装
```
docker run -d -p 6030-6049:6030-6049 -p 6030-6049:6030-6049/udp -v /opt/taosdata:/root/hertbeat/taos --name tdengine -e TZ=Asia/Shanghai tdengine/tdengine:2.4.0.12
```

hertzbeat安装
```
docker run -d -p 7070:1157 -v /root/hertzbeat/application.yml:/opt/hertzbeat/config/application.yml -v /root/hertzbeat/sureness.yml:/opt/hertzbeat/config/sureness.yml --name hertzbeat tancloud/hertzbeat:1.0-beta.7
```

mysql使用系统自带
mysql时间：
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48915473/168265545-fef22134-d3ce-4991-8928-084737526f02.png)

title: 建议处理日志中IP、账号与密码等敏感信息
body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13163673/168514519-fff05dde-730a-49b6-a719-ef1d1b00fe63.png)

**建议日志中针对IP、账号与密码等敏感信息做模糊处理**
当前控制台日志和日志文件中，系统监控模块中的服务器IP、账号与密码均明文显示，是严重的安全风险，建议迷糊处理，或者采用对数据取hash值作为存储键。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13163673/168514519-fff05dde-730a-49b6-a719-ef1d1b00fe63.png)

**It is recommended to obfuscate sensitive information such as IP, account and password in the log**
In the current console log and log file, the server IP, account number, and password in the system monitoring module are displayed in plain text, which is a serious security risk. It is recommended to be confused, or use the hash value of the data as the storage key.

body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
可用性告警后，在验证过程中发现目标正常连接

**Describe the solution you'd like**
给默认的可用性警告添加阈值开关

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
比如说触发两次无法连接的情况，再进行告警
类似原来告警阈值里，设置响应时间告警时，可以设置触发次数

title: 非常好
body:
组织：武汉各大高校
地点：武汉，中国
联系方式： by02999@163.com
使用场景：所有功能都会用到。主要用于监控学校的数据中心
使用感受：很高兴能在github上看到如此优秀的开源监控产品，业务监控是我工作的一部分，我也有使用其他产品（如开源的zabbix和一些其他厂商的付费产品），与其他产品相比较，感觉hertbeat的优势时使用直观方便，但可能是刚开发没多久，功能可能不如一些老牌产品强大。期待后续更新。: )

body:
在告警恢复之后，原来的故障告警信息还是显示未处理
![1653116133(1)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/105963325/169639932-f711db0e-088a-4f80-ade3-2215834d2dd9.png)
而在首页的告警分布也一直显示告警信息

title: Discussion for OSPP and Project Setup Issue
body:
Hey I am Raag Bhutani, a Computer Science undergrad at University Institute of Engineering Technology, Panjab University, India, and a keen enthusiast in web development.

I am interested in contributing to "**Hertzbeat official website UI revision and document i18n**" project.

**However I am having some difficulties in setting up the project .** 

I am trying to set up the project through "Method 1: Quick installation by Docker". After  setting up docker on desktop and  pulling out the HertzBeat Docker image , and after running

title: 经常出现hertzbeat服务假死，浏览器无法访问hertzbeat
body: hertzbeat一开始可以正常使用，但是会突入出现hertzbeat假死的情况，就是：在浏览器上无法再访问hertzbeat。这时候去查看资源占用，会发现CPU基本跑满，内存基本耗关。重启hertzbeat后，又恢复正常，可以正常访问hertzbeat

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
Hertzbeat can be used normally at the beginning, but it will break into the situation of hertzbeat suspended animation, that is: hertzbeat can no longer be accessed on the browser. At this time, if you check the resource usage, you will find that the CPU is basically full and the memory is basically consumed. After restarting hertzbeat, it returns to normal, and you can access hertzbeat normally

title: 在自定义监控希望可以添加按时间告警的功能
body:
首先感谢开源项目，让之前都是零碎的脚本转化为平台去管理监控。

这里希望能添加个可以根据时间告警，比如公司内部有些微信公众号或者云服务器的到期提醒，这些提醒可能都是提醒到手机号或者邮箱，甚至有些人员离职导致账户没有及时更新导致提醒不到实际运营人这里，所以这里希望可以添加一个类似逾期告警的一个功能，可以通过告警平台配置 然后发送钉钉或微信通知。  目前的自定义监控还是需要http请求触发的，这里的到期告警其实不需要请求，只是需要个到期时间。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
First of all, thanks to the open source project, the script that was previously fragmented can be transformed into a platform to manage and monitor.

Here I hope to add an alarm that can be based on time, such as the expiration reminder of some WeChat public accounts or cloud servers in the company. These reminders may be reminders to mobile phone numbers or email addresses, and even some people leave the account and cause the account to not be updated in time. The actual operator is here, so I hope to add a function similar to the overdue alarm, which can be configured through the alarm platform and then sent DingTalk or WeChat notifications. The current custom monitoring still needs to be triggered by an http request. The expiration alarm here does not actually require a request, but only needs an expiration time.

title: 建议增加被动监测功能
body:
我看类似的监控工具都是主动探测的，我觉得需要增加一个被动的功能。
可以参考的是 https://healthchecks.io/

被动监测的玩法：
需要监测的服务定期通过http接口向监控机上报数据，或者仅仅是报个平安。一段时间没有报，或者数据有误，就发警报。

被动监测的用途：
1.apm位于公网，需要监测的服务位于内网。
2.简化告警逻辑，什么情况下需要告警由上报机决定。
3.上报机可以crontab跑脚本，可以通过monit跑比较复杂的逻辑。

举例：
1.每天跑mysql备份，备份完告诉监控机我备份完了
2.内网通过数据库监控某一条数据，定期告诉监控机这条数据还OK
3.家庭内网跑个脚本监测动态拨号的IP，有更新了告诉监控机，这个比监控机监控ddns更新方便。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
I see that similar monitoring tools are actively detected, and I think a passive function needs to be added.
You can refer to https://healthchecks.io/

The gameplay of passive monitoring:
The services that need to be monitored regularly report data to the monitoring machine through the http interface, or just report safety. If there is no report for a period of time, or the data is wrong, an alarm will be issued.

Uses of passive monitoring:
1. apm is located on the public network, and the services to be monitored are located on the intranet.
2. Simplify the alarm logic, and the reporting machine determines when an alarm is required.
3. The reporting machine can run scripts on crontab, and can run more complex logic through monit.

Example:
1. Run mysql backup every day, tell the monitoring machine that I have finished the backup after the backup
2. The intranet monitors a certain piece of data through the database, and regularly tells the monitoring machine that this data is OK
3. Run a script on the home network to monitor the IP of the dynamic dial-up, and tell the monitoring machine if it is updated. This is more convenient than monitoring the ddns update by the monitoring machine.

----    
thanks 👍 Very thoughtful suggestion, we refer to https://healthchecks.io/ for research

title: NA
body:
jsonpath是在自定义监控时配置yml定义脚本的，这里的关键字的意思是 匹配返回的内容中有多少个关键词 比如 jvm 这个就应该有1个。 
我看您想要实现的应该是采集指标 heap_used_precent 的值 这个可以通过http自定义监控配置jsonpath来实现

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
jsonpath configures the yml definition script when custom monitoring. The keyword here means how many keywords are in the content returned by the match. For example, there should be one for jvm.
I think what you want to achieve should be to collect the value of the heap_used_precent indicator. This can be achieved through http custom monitoring configuration jsonpath

body: 发现一个jvm监控的现象，我们提供了很多监控指标，但从文档上略显偏薄。是否可以考虑文档中补充：1.实际生产中需要监控哪些指标，阀值设置为多少（or 范围）合适，比如我们一般想知道啥时候增加xmx。2.当指标异常时，是否有对应的配置项进行异常指标的降低，即指标与配置的对应关系。

----    
We found a phenomenon of jvm monitoring. We provided a lot of monitoring indicators, but the documentation is slightly thin. Is it possible to consider adding in the document: 1. Which indicators need to be monitored in actual production, and what threshold (or range) is appropriate to set. For example, we generally want to know when to increase xmx. 2. When the index is abnormal, whether there is a corresponding configuration item to reduce the abnormal index, that is, the corresponding relationship between the index and the configuration.

title: [feature] More fine-grained monitoring for memory_pool
body: 其实我们会发现memory_pool中已经提供了六个name(即六个指标)的采集，但是我们在配置memory_pool阀值监控的时候，却不能更细粒度地选择到其中一个指标，比如只针对metaspace。现在的memory_pool监控对这六个指标都同时生效了那个阀值。

title: NA
body: > Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿 ---- In fact, we will find that the memory_pool has provided the collection of six names (that is, six indicators), but when we configure the memory_pool threshold monitoring, we cannot select one of the indicators in a finer-grained manner, such as only for metaspace. The current memory_pool monitoring takes effect on that threshold for all six indicators at the same time.

title: more powerful jsonpath parser
body:
### Description

【parseType: jsonPath】的配置具有一定的限制——不支持多层级的解析
实现：使用 -> 的方式支持多层级的解析

### Task List

1. 修改com.usthe.collector.collect.http.HttpCollectImpl#parseResponseByJsonPath方法实现此功能
2. elasticsearch增加cpu、mem和heap监控信息；通过 GET _nodes/stats 获取，通过上述功能解析response获取这部分数据

body:

----    
### Description

The configuration of [parseType: jsonPath] has certain restrictions - multi-level parsing is not supported
Implementation: use -> to support multi-level parsing

### Task List

1. Modify the com.usthe.collector.collect.http.HttpCollectImpl#parseResponseByJsonPath method to implement this function
2. Elasticsearch adds cpu, mem and heap monitoring information; obtain it through GET _nodes/stats, and obtain this part of the data through the above function parsing response

title: [Question] <告警通知策略增加阈值设置>
body:
### Question

被监控服务器在国外，经常会出现网络连接导致的告警，实际下次检测就立即恢复了，这种告警意义不大。
希望能够在通知策略处增加阈值，比如：
 连续3次出现告警那么进行通知

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

When the monitored server is abroad, there are often alarms caused by network connections. In fact, the next detection is immediately restored. This kind of alarm is of little significance.
It is desirable to be able to increase the threshold at the notification policy, such as:
 If an alarm occurs 3 times in a row, then notify

title: NA
body:
hi @WillPangZi 给忘了这个我们已经支持 设置application.yml配置文件的
```
alerter:
  # custom console url
  console-url: https://console.tancloud.cn
  # base of alert eval interval time, unit:ms. The next time is 2 times the previous time.
  alert-eval-interval-base: 600000
  # max of alert eval interval time, unit:ms
  max-alert-eval-interval: 86400000
  # system alert(available alert, reachable alert...) trigger times
  system-alert-trigger-times: 1
```
中的 ` system-alert-trigger-times` 参数为3次，可用性告警则会触发三次才会发告警

title: [BUG] The app-jvm code_cache collect failed
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48920254/196077545-fb5bdc59-9256-4592-83ac-1ca6c9acf915.png)


### Expected Behavior

expected： the code_cache show success


### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(v2.0)
```


### Debug logs

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48920254/196079083-54a69282-3ecb-47a7-aa9f-c76eca037692.png)

### Anything else?

_No response_

title: NA
body: JMX Metrics: java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Code Cache In JRE8 BUT NOT JRE11. In JRE11, CodeHeap 'non-nmethods' and CodeHeap 'non-profiled nmethods' instead of it. JRE8: JRE11: It's very hard to compatible with both versions. Suggest we add attention document in hertzbeat doc to note that the `Code Cache` only support jre8 OR remove this metrics in jvm monitor.

title: NA
body:
我觉得还是继续保留吧，毕竟Java8用的人仍然很多，文档说明一下就行了
如果后续打算升级到Java11的可以考虑去掉
当然最好是可以通过Java版本控制是否展示code_cache，不过会影响现有的逻辑，感觉不是很好

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
I think it's better to keep it. After all, there are still many people using Java8. The documentation will explain it.
If you plan to upgrade to Java 11 in the future, you can consider removing it
Of course, it is best to display code_cache through Java version control, but it will affect the existing logic, which is not very good

title: [Task] implement IoTDB used to store historical data
body:
### Description

目前历史数据使用tdengine存储（tdengine版本兼容性不太友好），添加IoTDB作为可选的数据存储
注：用户只可选择一个数据库进行存储

### Task List

- implement IoTDB used to store historical data
- test different version of IoTDB

title: NA
body:
添加新的需求

title: There are problems in collecting cpu cores and interrupts under Oracle Linux based on arm architecture
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

Under the Oracle Linux based on the arm architecture, there is a problem in collecting cpu cores and interrupt, and it will display&nbsp
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15188754/200468908-795eb151-2434-475d-a235-9771cc92082a.png)

After analyzing the source code, it is found that it is a script for collecting cpu, and there are some compatibility problems

Original collection script

LANG=C lscpu | awk -F: '/Model name/ {print $2}';awk '/processor/{core++} END{print core}' /proc/cpuinfo;uptime | sed 's/,/ /g' | awk '{for(i=NF-2;i<=NF;i++)print $i }' | xargs;vmstat 1 1 | awk 'NR==3{print $11}';vmstat 1 1 | awk 'NR==3{print $12}';vmstat 1 1 | awk 'NR==3{print $15}'

Where LANG=C lscpu | awk -F: '/Model name/ {print $2}'; , because Oracle Linux will have two nodes,  the Model Name and BIOS Model Name, so there are two lines of records when getting info

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15188754/200469192-1fe53600-2265-409f-a835-32db7f705fc8.png)

I changed it to

LANG=C lscpu | awk -F: '$1==\"Model name\" {print $2}';awk '/processor/{core++} END{print core}' /proc/cpuinfo;uptime | sed 's/,/ /g' | awk '{for(i=NF-2;i<=NF;i++)print $i }' | xargs;vmstat 1 1 | awk 'NR==3{print $11}';vmstat 1 1 | awk 'NR==3{print $12}';vmstat 1 1 | awk 'NR==3{print $15}'

The script that gets info  LANG=C lscpu | awk -F: '$1==\"Model name\" {print $2}';

### Expected Behavior

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15188754/200469490-0de54fe6-99e1-426a-8f12-d77b1cc98069.png)


### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(s):  latest version
```


### Debug logs

_No response_

### Anything else?

_No response_

title: [Question] <是否可以直接一键复制监控参数和分组监控>
body:
### Question

1.比如我的微服务有5台实例，除了监控host不一样，其他的都一样，我需要重复5次进行添加监控，是否可以一键复制新的表单，只需要更改某个参数即可添加
2.对于多实例的同一个监控，在列表里会有多条，是否可以支持以服务为一组的多级列表，点击搞服务名可以看到统一服务下的所有实例监控

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

1. For example, my microservice has 5 instances. Except for the different monitoring hosts, everything else is the same. I need to repeat 5 times to add monitoring. Is it possible to copy a new form with one click, and only need to change a certain parameter to add it

title: [Question] No problem encountered by AGENT, hope to help answer
body:
### Question

1.比如同一内网中，因安全隔离的问题，节点A只能与192.168.0.0/24通讯，节点B只能与172.16.0.0/24通讯，这样的话我就得部署2套hertzbeat系统。

像之前的开源的方式：
blackbox_exporter+prometheus+grafana，blackbox可以部署在多个探测点上，Prometheus最少部署一台，那么这个组合可以解决上面的问题。

所以我想解决类似的问题有什么好的方案可以提供吗？

感谢。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

1. For example, in the same intranet, due to security isolation, node A can only communicate with 192.168.0.0/24, and node B can only communicate with 172.16.0.0/24. In this case, I have to deploy two sets of hertzbeat systems.

Like the previous open source method:
blackbox_exporter+prometheus+grafana, blackbox can be deployed on multiple detection points, and at least one Prometheus is deployed, so this combination can solve the above problems.

So I want to solve a similar problem, is there any good solution you can provide?

grateful.

title: NA
body:
hi @dadapapapa 除了无agent的pull拉取模式，我们也正在推进类似于promethues pushgateway 的push server，提供指标主动上报接口。下一版本我们会支持适配promethues exporter数据协议，exporter上可以被抓取的指标hertzbeat都可以适配上。若`blackbox_exporter`和其它exporter一样原理的话，理论上可以走`blackbox_exporter` + `hertzbeat`. 

对于不同隔离网络的监控，我们其实还有另外一种想法，hertzbeat采集器分离，每个网络只部署采集器，汇总到一个hertzbeat server上，但这个需求近期应该不会排。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi @dadapapapa In addition to the pull mode without an agent, we are also promoting a push server similar to the promethues pushgateway, providing an interface for actively reporting indicators. In the next version, we will support the adaptation of the promethues exporter data protocol, and all the indicators that can be captured on the exporter can be adapted to hertzbeat. If `blackbox_exporter` is the same as other exporters, theoretically you can use `blackbox_exporter` + `hertzbeat`.

For the monitoring of different isolated networks, we actually have another idea. The hertzbeat collectors are separated, and only collectors are deployed in each network, and aggregated to one hertzbeat server. However, this demand should not be arranged in the near future.

title: [Question] Is the logic of PING connectivity reasonable?
body:
### Question

### 当前逻辑
ping 连通时返回ping耗时，未连通、异常时没有返回ping耗时。[相关代码](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/collector/src/main/java/com/usthe/collector/collect/icmp/IcmpCollectImpl.java)
### 问题
ping告警只能根据ping耗时触发，ping采集失败和异常情况没有ping 耗时。不能触发告警，而发现ping异常、超时正是ping检测的目的。是比ping耗时变长更严重的问题
### 建议
#### 方案一
ping采集发生异常、超时将ping耗时赋值为Long最大值，表示无穷大，可触发告警
#### 方案二
将采集失败、超时等异常情况添加到PING连通性的告警表达式配置中，可配置发生异常时告警

title: NA
body:
hi 谢谢反馈
> ping告警只能根据ping耗时触发，ping采集失败和异常情况没有ping 耗时。不能触发告警，而发现ping异常、超时正是ping检测的目的。是比ping耗时变长更严重的问题

这里如果是ping采集异常，联通失败或者超时，系统会有个[可用性告警]，这个对所有监控类型都会有，是内置的，不需要设置阈值来触发。[可用性告警]对监控来说，就是优先级为0的可用性指标采集失败时，自动发出，对应的监控状态也会变更

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi thanks for the feedback
> The ping alarm can only be triggered based on the ping time consumption, and the ping collection failure and abnormal conditions do not have the ping time consumption. An alarm cannot be triggered, but finding ping exceptions and timeouts is the purpose of ping detection. It is a more serious problem than the longer ping time

Here, if the ping collection is abnormal, China Unicom fails or times out, the system will have an [availability alarm], which will be available for all monitoring types, and it is built-in, and there is no need to set a threshold to trigger it. [Availability alarm] For monitoring, when the collection of availability indicators with a priority of 0 fails, it will be automatically issued, and the corresponding monitoring status will also change

title: [Question] How would I add monitor support for ETCD?
body:
### Question

Any template that I can create to support ETCD? How can I start this action,thanks.

title: NA
body:
Hi etcd has no adaptation support yet, you can use [custom monitoring](https://hertzbeat.com/docs/advanced/extend-point) to write yml to monitor etcd due etcd exposes promethues protocol metrics. Like [apache iotdb monitor](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app/app-iotdb.yml) or [apache shenyu montior](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app/app-shenyu.yml).  
Also, etcd is in roadmap we will support as soon as possible.

title: [Task] use Flyway to manage database versions, instead of jpa auto ddl
body:
### Description

jpa auto ddl 在添加新表或添加新列时效果很好，但是无法对数据库进行细粒度管理，例如删除列、删除索引、删除检查等。
Flyway可以很好地解决这个问题。

### Task List

- [ ] 引入Flyway并配置升级脚本

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Description

jpa auto ddl works great when adding new tables or adding new columns, but cannot do fine-grained management of the database, such as dropping columns, dropping indexes, dropping checks, etc.
Flyway can solve this problem very well.

### Task List

- [ ] Introduce Flyway and configure the upgrade script

2. 建议优化历史数据展示，可以让用户关闭不需要的监控指标历史图表；
3. 建议优化历史数据展示，可以让用户拖动关注的指标框；
4. 建议优化历史数据展示，使用彩色的图式，类似于Grafana的dashboard；
5. 建议中间件监控对象，增加 WebLogic 和 Nginx；
6. 建议Redis数据库监控配置，增加单实例模式、哨兵模式和集群模式三种；
7. 建议优化管理员用户密码，避免在配置文件中直接使用明文密码；
8. 建议在免费版中增加普通用户和分组的创建，不同的系统监控有不同的用户和分组（从收费企业版中下放该功能）；

title: [Question] 如何使用密钥监控操作系统/SSH
body:
### Question

Ver 1.2.5 ，docker部署
系统中仅看到密码填写，没有高级可选，文档中也没找到公钥的使用 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6883877/216870736-48b87b14-2d69-4e55-b804-cfdb30f30277.png)

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Ver 1.2.5, docker deployment
The system only sees the password to fill in, there is no advanced option, and the use of the public key is not found in the document
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6883877/216870736-48b87b14-2d69-4e55-b804-cfdb30f30277.png)

title: NA
body:
Facing the same issue

please Advice

title: NA
body:
hi 目前公钥免密登陆的方案支持如下:     
在安装包部署环境下(docker不行)，将部署hertzbeat所在主机的公钥赋权给对端linux主机，使其能免密登陆，然后在hertzbeat直接添加对端主机即可。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi The current public key password-free login solution supports the following:
In the installation package deployment environment (docker does not work), authorize the public key of the host where hertzbeat is deployed to the peer linux host so that it can log in without password, and then directly add the peer host to hertzbeat.

title: NA
body:
了解，我按公钥免密的思路，在hertzbeat的docker容器中安装了ssh服务，生成了密钥对，把公钥写入目标主机，测试容器访问目标主机已经免密了，但是系统还是报错。
简单看了下代码对应位置，sshProtocol.getPublicKey()好像没有赋值，这是个bug么
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6883877/216933418-3587cc1b-bc04-42ee-a94d-dcf3b8e050bc.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6883877/216933452-846c0676-b96e-4b15-804c-06506bd76227.png)

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
I understand, I installed the ssh service in the docker container of Hertzbeat according to the idea of ​​freeing the public key, generated a key pair, and wrote the public key into the target host. The test container access to the target host has been password-free, but the system still reports an error .
After a brief look at the corresponding position of the code, sshProtocol.getPublicKey() does not seem to be assigned a value. Is this a bug?
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6883877/216933418-3587cc1b-bc04-42ee-a94d-dcf3b8e050bc.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6883877/216933452-846c0676-b96e-4b15-804c-06506bd76227.png)

title: NA
body:
Hi `publicKey` 这个属性暂时是没有用到，已支持的这种公钥免密思路是ssh时自动使用本地环境中公钥去尝试。   
前端输入`publicKey` 这种方式我们后面尝试支持一下。
你试试重启hertzbeat docker容器再测下好使吗，我们之前验证也是在安装包环境好使，docker环境不行.

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
Hi `publicKey` This attribute is not used for the time being. The idea of ​​exempting the public key is to automatically use the public key in the local environment to try when ssh.
The front-end input `publicKey` This way we will try to support it later.
Can you try to restart the hertzbeat docker container and test it again? We verified that it works well in the installation package environment, but not in the docker environment.

Hi Guys,

Thanks for your latest update for docker image.

I just setup this hertzbeat on our server  using docker(docker run -d -p 1157:1157 --name hertzbeat tancloud/hertzbeat),
we have added Ubuntu Linux(OS Monitor) the metrics should be fine,because i can see from the dashboard that this monitoring system could collect all the metrics from the target server.

I setup the alert notify to telegram and its successfully send the test alert and i also setup the alert setting,you can refer to the screenshot below :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63686253/217169377-9bef08e1-b31a-468c-9ab7-80e6aec2cbd9.png)

fyi, current usage for "/" (root) is 65 % already but its not send any alert.

Please Advice

Thanks in advance

title: NA
body: Hi, if you have added Ubuntu Linux(OS Monitor) by **Ubuntu Linux**, the alert setting metric target should be `Ubuntu Linux` not `Linux`.

title: NA
body:
Hi @tomsun28,

Thanks for your reply.

I made it already,

Regarding the notification rule,is it possible to send the notification only once per policy so it wont send the same notification repeatedly

Please Advice

Thanks in advance

title: NA
body:
> Regarding the notification rule,is it possible to send the notification only once per policy so it wont send the same notification repeatedly

Hi, the notification policy are each independent, can not send only once per policy.  

If you worry about too many same alerts. We will support alarm grouping and alarm silence some time later

body:

```
free -m | grep Mem | awk 'BEGIN{print "total used free buff_cache available"} {print $2,$3,$4,$6,$7}'
```
to 
```
free -m | awk 'BEGIN{print "total used free buff_cache available"} NR==2{print $2,$3,$4,$6,$7}'
```

body:
hi has you modify application.yml config `warehouse.store.memory` or `warehouse.store.redis` ? 

```
warehouse:
  store:
    redis:
      enabled: false
      host: 127.0.0.1
      port: 6379
      password: 123456
    memory:
      enabled: true
      init-size: 1024
```

Hi,

I am experiencing an issue and this issue is frequently happened.
I get High load on my CPU and Memory and to fix this issue i need to restart my container ( i run hertzbeat as docker) and always the service which has high load is java -server -XX:SurvivorRatio=6 -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:HeapDumpPath=/opt/hertzbeat/logs -Dlogging.path+

I also found that i get this logs from my logs file,you can refer to the link below :

https://pastebin.com/emMCxJn6

Please Advice

Thanks in advance

Thanks 👍

title: how to config aliyun email
body:
### Question

how to config aliyun email?

title: NA
body:
```
spring: 
  mail:
    # Attention: this is mail server address.
    # 请注意此为邮件服务器地址：qq邮箱为 smtp.qq.com qq企业邮箱为 smtp.exmail.qq.com
    host: smtp.exmail.qq.com
    username: example@tancloud.cn
    # Attention: this is not email account password, this requires an email authorization code
    # 请注意此非邮箱账户密码 此需填写邮箱授权码
    password: example
    port: 465
    default-encoding: UTF-8
    properties:
      mail:
        smtp:
          socketFactoryClass: javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
          ssl:
            enable: true
        debug: false
```

hi 参数修改为阿里云的即可，或者百度下 阿里云邮件服务器开启

title: [Task] <support iotdb version 1.0.+>
body:
### Description

目前iotdb已经迭代到1.0.1，部分用户使用的1.0.+的IoTDB，可以支持1.0.0和1.0.1的版本的IoTDB
存在问题：
是否需要保留兼容老的版本，能否兼容老的版本数据？
感觉可以保留0.13.+的版本，目前也在迭代，可以去掉0.12.+版本的兼容

_No response_

### Description

At present, iotdb has been iterated to 1.0.1, and the 1.0.+ IoTDB implemented by some users can support 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 versions of IoTDB
Have a question?
Is it necessary to keep compatible with the old version, and can it be compatible with the old version data?

_No response_

title: NA
body:
> 感觉可以保留0.13.+的版本，目前也在迭代，可以去掉0.12.+版本的兼容     

+1，建议使用 ``或者其它 来避免很多iotdb内置特殊字符串和指标名称相同而造成的插入失败的问题

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿

> I feel that the 0.13.+ version can be kept, and it is currently being iterated, and the compatibility of the 0.12.+ version can be removed

+1, it is recommended to use `` or other to avoid the problem of insertion failure caused by many iotdb built-in special strings and the same index name

title: [Question] <title> How to upgrade from the old version to the latest version, the monitoring configuration data needs to be preserved
body:
### Question

已经使用[hertzbeat](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat) 一段时间，监控的配置有二十多个，现在想升级成最新版本。需保留监控配置数据。原系统使用docker-compose部署，如何进行操作升级

title: NA
body:

----    
### Question

I have been using [hertzbeat](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat) for a while, and there are more than 20 monitoring configurations, and now I want to upgrade to the latest version. The monitoring configuration data needs to be preserved. The original system is deployed with docker-compose, how to upgrade

title: NA
body: hi 如果是不太老的版本应该是可以通过更新镜像版本来升级的，我们每个版本发版会有升级注意，如果没写就表示可以无缝升级 https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/releases

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi If the version is not too old, it should be able to be upgraded by updating the mirror version. We will have an upgrade note for each version release. If it is not written, it means that it can be seamlessly upgraded https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat /releases

hi If you use the jdbc sql protocol to collect data, you can write the filter conditions in the configuration sql, or use other methods such as http jsonpath filter expression `?()` to filter during collection, but the post-collection filter you mentioned is not yet available. Support Welcome to submit a feature issue, describe the requirements in detail, we will consider supporting a wave later

title: [Task] <add push style data collector>
body:
### Description

添加push方式的数据采集，类似Prometheus的pushgateway
为什么需要添加push模式？
+ 方便用户自定义需要监控的数据
+ 对于内网的应用，hertzbeat部署在外网无法访问内网的应用

### Task List

具体描述：

- [ ] 前端创建对应的push monitor，生成monitorId作为push模块的key
- [ ] 新增push module，暴露接口供用户调用push监控数据，push模块存储和定时删除数据。
- [ ] collector模块定时拉取push模块的数据，并复用数据采集的部分逻辑，进行存储（内存和磁盘）和删除（暂时使用定时删除，有能力可以根据当前使用内存进行判断是否需要删除）
- [ ] 前端调用展示用户自定义的数据

There should be a client, such as redis_client, which regularly collects redis monitoring data and pushes it to hertzbeat

是的，应该需要用户编写的client向push module推送数据。
push module如果部署在外网的话，网关就只需要放行出口流量。如果push module在内网则需要放行一个入口流量，以便于collect module访问push module
@gcdd1993

title: NA
body: @tomsun28 有一个问题还是要考虑一下的，push需不需要单独部署，因为prometheus是通过一个exporter的，pushgateway单独一个模块很正常，我们的push功能其实合并也是可以的。要考虑一下单独部署有什么好处，毕竟单独部署和配置增加了用户的操作

title: NA
NA
body:
> @tomsun28 有一个问题还是要考虑一下的，push需不需要单独部署，因为prometheus是通过一个exporter的，pushgateway单独一个模块很正常，我们的push功能其实合并也是可以的。要考虑一下单独部署有什么好处，毕竟单独部署和配置增加了用户的操作

我们第一版本可以把push做成一个模块，暂时不单独部署，和其它模块一样all in one的形式。单独部署我觉得可以在以后的集群环境下，多采集器和PUSH接收器再支持多进程单独部署。感觉目前没有这个必要，单独部署增加了用户配置操作成本。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
> @tomsun28 One question still needs to be considered, whether push needs to be deployed separately, because prometheus is through an exporter, it is normal for pushgateway to be a single module, and our push function can actually be merged. Consider the benefits of separate deployment, after all, separate deployment and configuration increase user operations

In our first version, push can be made into a module, and it will not be deployed separately for the time being. It is in the form of all in one like other modules. Separate deployment I think that in the future cluster environment, multi-collectors and PUSH receivers can support multi-process separate deployment. I feel that this is not necessary at present, and separate deployment increases the cost of user configuration operations.

title: [BUG] <Ubuntu Linux monitoring false positive unavailable state>
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

hertzbeat部署在docker中，docker所在的容器监控Linux Ubuntu报警不可用

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Steps To Reproduce

1. hertzbeat通过docker部署，数据库为docker部署的MySQL8.0
2. Linux Ubuntu监控使用22端口，IP使用服务器IP，未使用127.0.0.1
3. hertzbeat报警，hertzbeat所在服务器本身状态为不可用
4. 重启hertzbeat容器后恢复，一段时间后重现报警
5. 通过其他服务器可以ping和telnet端口

### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(s):1.3.0
```


### Debug logs

[60a5f0d5664a10-2023-03-13.0.log](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/files/10956918/60a5f0d5664a10-2023-03-13.0.log)


### Anything else?

_No response_

title: [BUG] <title> Monitoring status acquisition error
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

虚拟机网络出现问题 导致机器的IP发生变化， 我在web-ui的监控里面修改了对应的设置 但是那个监控状态按钮显示的对应内容 就在正常监控和不可用之间来回的切换。

### Expected Behavior

虚拟机网络出现问题 导致机器的IP发生变化， 我在web-ui的监控里面修改了对应的设置 但是那个监控状态按钮显示的对应内容 就在正常监控和不可用之间来回的切换。

### Steps To Reproduce

虚拟机网络出现问题 导致机器的IP发生变化， 我在web-ui的监控里面修改了对应的设置 但是那个监控状态按钮显示的对应内容 就在正常监控和不可用之间来回的切换。

### Environment

```markdown
1.3.5
```


### Debug logs

虚拟机网络出现问题 导致机器的IP发生变化， 我在web-ui的监控里面修改了对应的设置 但是那个监控状态按钮显示的对应内容 就在正常监控和不可用之间来回的切换。

### Anything else?

虚拟机网络出现问题 导致机器的IP发生变化， 我在web-ui的监控里面修改了对应的设置 但是那个监控状态按钮显示的对应内容 就在正常监控和不可用之间来回的切换。

title: [Task]注释翻译任务认领 <Monitoring define yml comment translation>
body:
### Description

#### 注释并翻译任务认领

> 注意一次尽量只领取一到两篇，给其它小伙伴机会

**领取方式，在本 issues 下评论对应任务即可。如下**

- [ ] Translate https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app-zookeeper.yml

```
- [ ] Translate https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app-zookeeper.yml

```

注释并且翻译监控YML定义文件内容，需支持英文和中文，请注意格式对齐。  
注释并且翻译内容需要到YML文件里面的一个metrics指标组定义，其余metrics内容无需注释翻译，参考如下 `#` 内容。   
Comments and Translate the content of the yml file, en and zh_cn
Comments and Translate until metrics[0] of content. The metrics after metrics[0] do not need. 
eg:  [app-a_example.yml](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app-a_example.yml) 
 
```
# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
# contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
# this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
# The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
# (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
# the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

# The monitoring type category：service-application service monitoring db-database monitoring custom-custom monitoring os-operating system monitoring
# 监控类型所属类别：service-应用服务监控 db-数据库监控 custom-自定义监控 os-操作系统监控 cn-云原生cloud native network-网络监控
category: custom
# The monitoring type eg: linux windows tomcat mysql aws...
# 监控类型 eg: linux windows tomcat mysql aws...
app: a_example
# The monitoring i18n name
# 监控类型国际化名称
name:
  zh-CN: 模拟应用
  en-US: EXAMPLE APP
# 监控所需输入参数定义(根据定义渲染页面UI)
# Input params define for monitoring(render web ui by the definition)
params:
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: host
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 主机Host
      en-US: Host
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input type)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: host
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: true
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: port
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 端口
      en-US: Port
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input type)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: number
    # when type is number, range is required
    # 当type为number时,用range表示范围
    range: '[0,65535]'
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: true
    # default value
    # 默认值
    defaultValue: 80
    # 参数输入框提示信息
    # param field input placeholder
    placeholder: '请输入端口'
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: username
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 用户名
      en-US: Username
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input type)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: text
    # when type is text, use limit to limit string length
    # 当type为text时,用limit表示字符串限制大小
    limit: 20
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: false
    # hide param-true or false
    # 是否隐藏字段 true or false
    hide: true
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: password
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 用户密码
      en-US: Password
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input tag)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: password
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: false
    # hide param-true or false
    # 是否隐藏字段 true or false
    hide: true
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: ssl
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 启动SSL
      en-US: SSL
    # type-param field type(boolean mapping the html switch tag)
    # type-当type为boolean时,前端用switch展示开关
    type: boolean
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: false
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: method
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 请求方式
      en-US: Method
    # type-param field type(radio mapping the html radio tag)
    # type-当type为radio时,前端用radio展示开关
    type: radio
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: true
    # when type is radio checkbox, use option to show optional values {name1:value1,name2:value2}
    # 当type为radio单选框, checkbox复选框时, option表示可选项值列表 {name1:value1,name2:value2}
    options:
      - label: GET
        value: GET
      - label: POST
        value: POST
      - label: PUT
        value: PUT
      - label: DELETE
        value: DELETE
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: headers
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 请求Headers
      en-US: Headers
    # type-param field type(key-value mapping the html key-value input tags)
    # type-字段类型(key-value映射为前端key-value的双input格式渲染)
    type: key-value
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: false
    # when type is key-value, use keyAlias to config key alias name
    # 当字段类型为key-value时, 使用keyAlias配置key的展示别名
    keyAlias: Header Name
    # when type is key-value, use valueAlias to config value alias name
    # 当字段类型为key-value时, 使用valueAlias配置value的展示别名
    valueAlias: Header Value
# collect metrics config list
# 采集指标组配置列表
metrics:
  # metrics - cpu
  # 监控指标组 - cpu
  - name: cpu
    # metrics group scheduling priority(0->127)->(high->low), metrics with the same priority will be scheduled in parallel
    # priority 0's metrics group is availability metrics, it will be scheduled first, only availability metrics collect success will the scheduling continue
    # 指标组调度优先级(0->127)->(优先级高->低) 优先级低的指标组会等优先级高的指标组采集完成后才会被调度, 相同优先级的指标组会并行调度采集
    # 优先级为0的指标组为可用性指标组,即它会被首先调度,采集成功才会继续调度其它指标组,采集失败则中断调度
    priority: 0
    # collect metrics content
    # 具体监控指标列表
    fields:
      # field-metric name, type-metric type(0-number,1-string), unit-metric unit('%','ms','MB'), instance-if is metrics group unique identifier
      # field-指标名称, type-指标类型(0-number数字,1-string字符串), unit-指标单位('%','ms','MB'), instance-是否是指标集合唯一标识符字段
      - field: hostname
        type: 1
        instance: true
      - field: usage
        type: 0
        unit: '%'
      - field: cores
        type: 0
      - field: waitTime
        type: 0
        unit: s
    # (optional)metrics field alias name, it is used as an alias field to map and convert the collected data and metrics field
    # (可选)监控指标别名, 做为中间字段与采集数据字段和指标字段映射转换
    aliasFields:
      - hostname
      - core1
      - core2
      - usage
      - allTime
      - runningTime
    # mapping and conversion expressions, use these and aliasField above to calculate metrics value
    # (可选)指标映射转换计算表达式,与上面的别名一起作用,计算出最终需要的指标值
    # eg: cores=core1+core2, usage=usage, waitTime=allTime-runningTime
    calculates:
      - hostname=hostname
      - cores=core1+core2
      - usage=usage
      - waitTime=allTime-runningTime
    # the protocol used for monitoring, eg: sql, ssh, http, telnet, wmi, snmp, sdk
    protocol: http
    # the config content when protocol is http
    http:
      # http host: ipv4 ipv6 domain
      host: ^_^host^_^
      # http port
      port: ^_^port^_^
      # http url
      url: /metrics/cpu
      # http method: GET POST PUT DELETE PATCH
      method: GET
      # if enabled https
      ssl: false
      # http request header content
      headers:
        ^_^headers^_^: ^_^headers^_^
      # http request params
      params:
        param1: param1
        param2: param2
      # http auth
      authorization:
        # http auth type: Basic Auth, Digest Auth, Bearer Token
        type: Basic Auth
        basicAuthUsername: ^_^username^_^
        basicAuthPassword: ^_^password^_^
      # http response data parse type: default-hertzbeat rule, jsonpath-jsonpath script, website-for website monitoring, prometheus-prometheus exporter rule
      # http 响应数据解析方式: default-系统规则, jsonPath-jsonPath脚本, website-网站可用性指标监控, prometheus-Prometheus数据规则
      parseType: jsonPath
      parseScript: '$'

  - name: memory
    priority: 1
    fields:
      - field: hostname
        type: 1
        instance: true
      - field: total
        type: 0
        unit: kb
      - field: usage
        type: 0
        unit: '%'
      - field: speed
        type: 0
    protocol: http
    http:
      host: ^_^host^_^
      port: ^_^port^_^
      url: /metrics/memory
      method: GET
      headers:
        apiVersion: v1
      params:
        param1: param1
        param2: param2
      authorization:
        type: Basic Auth
        basicAuthUsername: ^_^username^_^
        basicAuthPassword: ^_^password^_^
      parseType: default

```

title: [Task] Please increase the number of retries to reduce the frequency of problems
body:
### Description

问题：因为网络原因，一些主动监控，只有一次超时就会告警
建议：麻烦学习一下uptime-kuma增加重新尝试次数和尝试间隔，比如尝试3次失败后再报问题
风险：当然增加重试次数会增加服务负载，这块也可以交于使用者来掌控

### Task List


--》增加重试次数
--》增加重试间隔时间
--》增加状态变化时才告警通知，比如上次状态是不可用，本次检查状态仍未不可用就不用告警，除非状态不匹配才发送告警
![增加重试次数2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16797633/227824741-4e9202b2-c99c-423b-8ba2-072d31102551.jpg)
![增加重试次数](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16797633/227824745-494e89dd-061d-4073-a6ec-438b745ccc5a.jpg)

Problem: Due to network reasons, some active monitoring, only one timeout will give an alarm
Suggestion: Please learn about uptime-kuma to increase the number of retries and the interval between attempts, for example, after 3 failed attempts, report the problem
Risk: Of course, increasing the number of retries will increase the service load, which can also be controlled by the user

title: [Question] Can monitoring time be set?
body:
### Question

现在有这么个场景，某些环境下只有在特定时间才会开放。如果是全时间段监测，就会在不开放时间段一直报错。
想问下，这个可以设置一个监控时间范围吗？
比如API监控，设定在10:00-14:00，每1800秒调用一次，确保接口是正常的。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Now there is such a scene, some environments will only be open at certain times. If it is a full-time monitoring, it will always report an error during the closed time period.
I would like to ask, is it possible to set a monitoring time range for this?
For example, API monitoring is set at 10:00-14:00 and called every 1800 seconds to ensure that the interface is normal.

support udp port availability monitoring

- [ ] support udp port availability monitoring
- [ ] add help document

title: NA

title: NA
body: @tomsun28 I tried searching for a fix for this problem, I cant seem to find something. Can you help me a bit?

title: NA
body:
> @tomsun28 I tried searching for a fix for this problem, I cant seem to find something. Can you help me a bit?

@ArslanYM hi, yes i can. This feature need to support a new monitor type - udp port monitoring. 
I think we should do it in a few steps.
- Define a new monitoring protocol - udp protocol.  Refer to `telnet protocol` https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/common/src/main/java/com/usthe/common/entity/job/protocol/TelnetProtocol.java 
- Implment udp protocol collect code use java udp socket. Refer to `telnet collect impl` https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/collector/src/main/java/com/usthe/collector/collect/telnet/TelnetCollectImpl.java 
- Use this protocol to define udp monitor type yml. Refer to `telnet monitor type define yml` https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app-port.yml

All done. After this we can test our new monitoring type.

> * Use this protocol to define udp monitor type yml. Refer to `telnet monitor type define yml` https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app-port.yml
> 
> All done. After this we can test our new monitoring type.

title: [BUG] <StatusCode 404 reported when connecting to nacos2.0.3 version container>
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

1.拉取master分支的源代码，本地代码方式部署启动后，配置nacos注册配置中心时，显示测试连接失败StatusCode 404，后更换为镜像的app-nacos.yml 配置文件，可正常使用，希望找出问题原因

2.源代码app-nacos.yml配置
```
# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
# contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
# this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
# The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
# (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
# the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

# The monitoring type category：service-application service monitoring db-database monitoring custom-custom monitoring os-operating system monitoring mid-middleware
# 监控类型所属类别：service-应用服务监控 db-数据库监控 custom-自定义监控 os-操作系统监控 cn-云原生cloud native network-网络监控 mid-中间件
category: mid
# The monitoring: nacos
# 监控类型 nacos
app: nacos
# The monitoring i18n name
# 监控类型国际化名称
name:
  zh-CN: Nacos注册配置中心
  en-US: Nacos Server
# 监控所需输入参数定义(根据定义渲染页面UI)
# Input params define for monitoring(render web ui by the definition)
params:
  # field-param field key
  # field-变量字段标识符
  - field: host
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 服务器Host
      en-US: Host
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input type)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: host
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: true
  # required-true or false
  # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
  - field: port
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: Nacos服务端口
      en-US: Nacos Port
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input type)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: number
    # when type is number, range is required
    # 当type为number时,用range表示范围
    range: '[0,65535]'
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: true
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    defaultValue: 8848

# collect metrics config list
# 采集指标组配置列表
metrics:
  # metrics - system
  # 监控指标组 - system
  - name: system
    # metrics group scheduling priority(0->127)->(high->low), metrics with the same priority will be scheduled in parallel
    # priority 0's metrics group is availability metrics, it will be scheduled first, only availability metrics collect success will the scheduling continue
    # 指标组调度优先级(0->127)->(优先级高->低) 优先级低的指标组会等优先级高的指标组采集完成后才会被调度, 相同优先级的指标组会并行调度采集
    # 优先级为0的指标组为可用性指标组,即它会被首先调度,采集成功才会继续调度其它指标组,采集失败则中断调度
    priority: 0
    # collect metrics content
    # 具体监控指标列表
    fields:
      # field-metric name, type-metric type(0-number,1-string), unit-metric unit('%','ms','MB'), instance-if is metrics group unique identifier
      # field-指标名称, type-指标类型(0-number数字,1-string字符串), unit-指标单位('%','ms','MB'), instance-是否是指标集合唯一标识符字段
      - field: system_cpu_usage
        type: 0
        unit: '%'
      - field: system_average_load
        type: 0
      - field: system_memory_usage
        type: 0
        unit: '%'
    # (optional)metrics field alias name, it is used as an alias field to map and convert the collected data and metrics field
    # (可选)监控指标别名, 做为中间字段与采集数据字段和指标字段映射转换
    aliasFields:
      - cpu
      - load
      - mem
    # mapping and conversion expressions, use these and aliasField above to calculate metrics value
    # (可选)指标映射转换计算表达式,与上面的别名一起作用,计算出最终需要的指标值
    # eg: cores=core1+core2, usage=usage, waitTime=allTime-runningTime
    calculates:
      - system_cpu_usage=cpu * 100
      - system_average_load=load
      - system_memory_usage=mem * 100
    # the protocol used for monitoring, eg: sql, ssh, http, telnet, wmi, snmp, sdk
    # 监控使用协议, 例如: sql, ssh, http, telnet, wmi, snmp, sdk
    protocol: http
    # the config content when protocol is http
    # 当使用http协议时的配置内容
    http:
        # http host: ipv4 ipv6 domain
        # http 主机：ipv4 ipv6域名
        host: ^_^host^_^
        # http port
        # http 端口
        port: ^_^port^_^
        # http url
        url: /nacos/v2/ns/operator/metrics?onlyStatus=false
        # http method: GET POST PUT DELETE PATCH
        # http 请求方法: GET POST PUT DELETE PATCH
        method: GET
        # http response data parse type: default-hertzbeat rule, jsonpath-jsonpath script, website-for website monitoring, prometheus-prometheus exporter rule
        # http 响应数据解析方式: default-系统规则, jsonPath-jsonPath脚本, website-网站可用性指标监控, prometheus-Prometheus数据规则
        parseType: jsonPath
        parseScript: $.data

  - name: jvm_gc_count
    priority: 1
    fields:
      - field: total_gc_count
        type: 0
    aliasFields:
      - value
    calculates:
      - total_gc_count=value
    protocol: http
    http:
        host: ^_^host^_^
        port: ^_^port^_^
        url: /nacos/actuator/metrics/jvm.gc.pause
        method: GET
        parseType: jsonPath
        parseScript: $.measurements[0]

  - name: jvm_gc_time
    priority: 1
    fields:
      - field: total_gc_time
        type: 0
        unit: 's'
    aliasFields:
      - value
    calculates:
      - total_gc_time=value
    protocol: http
    http:
      host: ^_^host^_^
      port: ^_^port^_^
      url: /nacos/actuator/metrics/jvm.gc.pause
      method: GET
      parseType: jsonPath
      parseScript: $.measurements[1]

  - name: nacos
    priority: 1
    fields:
      - field: service_count
        type: 0
      - field: client_count
        type: 0
    aliasFields:
      - serviceCount
      - clientCount
    calculates:
      - service_count=serviceCount
      - client_count=clientCount
    protocol: http
    http:
      host: ^_^host^_^
      port: ^_^port^_^
      url: /nacos/v2/ns/operator/metrics?onlyStatus=false
      method: GET
      parseType: jsonPath
      parseScript: $.data
```


3.镜像app-nacos.yml配置

```
category: mid
app: nacos
name:
  zh-CN: Nacos注册配置中心
  en-US: Nacos Server
params:
  - field: host
    name:
      zh-CN: 服务器Host
      en-US: Host
    type: host
    required: true
  - field: port
    name:
      zh-CN: Nacos服务端口
      en-US: Nacos Port
    type: number
    range: '[0,65535]'
    required: true
    defaultValue: 8848
metrics:
  - name: cpu
    priority: 0
    fields:
      - field: system_cpu_usage
        type: 0
        unit: '%'
    aliasFields:
      - value
    calculates:
      - system_cpu_usage=value * 100
    protocol: http
    http:
      # 主机host: ipv4 ipv6 域名
      host: ^_^host^_^
      # 端口
      port: ^_^port^_^
      # url请求接口路径
      url: /nacos/actuator/metrics/system.cpu.usage
      # 请求方式 GET POST PUT DELETE PATCH
      method: GET
      # 响应数据解析方式: default-系统规则,jsonPath-jsonPath脚本,website-api可用性指标监控
      parseType: jsonPath
      parseScript: $.measurements[*]
  - name: memory
    priority: 1
    fields:
      - field: jvm_memory_used
        type: 0
        unit: 'MB'
    aliasFields:
      - value
    calculates:
      - jvm_memory_used=value
    units:
      - jvm_memory_used=B->MB
    protocol: http
    http:
      # 主机host: ipv4 ipv6 域名
      host: ^_^host^_^
      # 端口
      port: ^_^port^_^
      # url请求接口路径
      url: /nacos/actuator/metrics/jvm.memory.used
      # 请求方式 GET POST PUT DELETE PATCH
      method: GET
      # 响应数据解析方式: default-系统规则,jsonPath-jsonPath脚本,website-api可用性指标监控
      parseType: jsonPath
      parseScript: $.measurements[*]
```



### Expected Behavior

可能nacos最新版本他的权限api策略变更了

### Steps To Reproduce

```markdown
nacos版本2.0.3
HertzBeaat版本1.3
HertzBeaat镜像版本 tancloud/hertzbeat:1.3
```

2023-04-13 11:15:17 [241143853675264-nacos-system-7315] INFO  org.dromara.hertzbeat.collector.dispatch.MetricsCollect - [Collect Failed, Run 36ms, All 36ms] Reason: StatusCode 404

title: [BUG] <Denial-of-service attacks due to long passwords>
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

./collector/manager/src/main/java/org/dromara/hertzbeat/manager
此段代码实现了一个账户控制器，主要实现了账户登录和刷新 TOKEN 等功能，其中包括用于账户密码登录的部分中，在验证了是否有账户信息以及是否有密码输入，若获取不到账户信息，或者密码为空，则返回一个带有错误提示信息的 Message 对象，否则，它将使用提供的凭证对密码进行 MD5 加密，并将加密后的密码与账户密码进行比较。在此期间并没有限制最大长度。如果我们在登陆是提交一个非常长的口令，就会迫使系统执行长口令的 MD5 加密过程，导致服务器CPU 及内存耗尽，从而对服务器造成拒绝服务攻击，这可能导致服务器长时间宕机，即无法使用或无响应




### Expected Behavior

我们使用 python 语言，通过生成随机长字符串模拟随机长口令，之后我们
依次循环地向服务器发送短口令和长口令，短口令是为了证明程序响应时间正常，
长口令是为了验证该程序存在的拒绝服务攻击，在发送长口令的同时，我们还会
在浏览器进行正确账户的登录，以此验证此次攻击确实会造成服务器宕机。

### Steps To Reproduce

环境搭建：
       根据在 gitee 社区的指导文件进行环境搭建
       参考链接：https://gitee.com/dromara/hertzbeat
代码逻辑：
       我们使用 python 语言，通过生成随机长字符串模拟随机长口令，之后我们
依次循环地向服务器发送短口令和长口令，短口令是为了证明程序响应时间正常，
长口令是为了验证该程序存在的拒绝服务攻击，在发送长口令的同时，我们还会
在浏览器进行正确账户的登录，以此验证此次攻击确实会造成服务器宕机。浏览
器登录测试请见视频，视频中首先模拟了拒绝服务攻击，并验证了攻击时登录会
发生卡顿。
POC代码：
       代码中 headers 字段是使用 Wireshark 抓包正常登陆时的 HTTP 请求包得到
的字段。
`import requests
url = "http://localhost:1157/passport/login"
headers = {"User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux 
x86_64;rv:83.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/83.0","Accept": 
"application/json, text/plain, */*", "Accept-Language": "enUS,en;q=0.5","Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate","ContentType":"applicationjson;charset=utf8","Origin": 
"http://localhost:1157/passport/login","Connection": "keep-alive", 
"Referer":"http://localhost:1157/passport/login"}
for i in [1,10000,1,15000,1,20000,1,22500]:
       passwd = "abcde12345" * i * 10000
       data = {"name": "admin", "pass": f"{passwd}",}
       r = requests.post(url , headers=headers, data=data,timeout=999)
       print(f"密码长度：{i} 十万")
       print("响应时间：",r.elapsed.total_seconds())
       print("-"*20)
`


### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(s):v1.3.x
```


### Debug logs

或许可以在代码中增加限制口令输入上限的部分

### Anything else?

[hertzbeat口令过长引起的拒绝服务攻击.zip](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/files/11222013/hertzbeat.zip)

title: [Feature] <Have you considered adding the service restart function>
body:
### Question

背景：项目上需要进行内网监控，目前内网数据可以通过边界到互联网，也就是互联网可以收到监控告警，但是无法远程进入内网服务器。
需求：在监控告警时，连接目标服务器，发送指定重启服务的命令，避免小问题深夜到现场处理。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Background: Intranet monitoring is required for the project. At present, intranet data can pass through the border to the Internet, that is, the Internet can receive monitoring alarms, but it cannot remotely access the intranet server.
Requirements: When monitoring alarms, connect to the target server and send a specified command to restart the service, avoiding minor problems to be dealt with on-site late at night.

title: [Task] <use dromara/SMS4J instead of single tencent sms>
body:
### Description

### Expected Behavior

./startup.sh

### Steps To Reproduce

1,download [Microsoft JDBC Driver 12.2 for SQL Server (tar.gz)]

2,change driver
cd /opt/hertzbeat/lib

mv mssql-jdbc-12.2.0.jre11.jar /opt/hertzbeat/lib
chmod 775 mssql-jdbc-12.2.0.jre11.jar

3,startup
cd /opt/hertzbeat/bin
./startup.sh

title: NA
body: 你好，这不是一个bug，在修改jar文件时，由于之前打包的文件是mssql-jdbc-10.2.1.jre8.jar而不是mssql-jdbc-12.2.0.jre11.jar，所以找不到这个依赖，你需要修改hertzbeat/hertzbeat.jar文件，使用解压缩软件直接修改其中的META-INF/MANIFEST.MF文件，搜索mssql-jdbc-10.2.1.jre8.jar替换为mssql-jdbc-12.2.0.jre11.jar之后运行，就可以了。我测试了可以正常运行。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
Hello, this is not a bug, when modifying the jar file, since the previously packaged file is mssql-jdbc-10.2.1.jre8.jar instead of mssql-jdbc-12.2.0.jre11.jar, it cannot find this Depends, you need to modify the hertzbeat/hertzbeat.jar file, use the decompression software to directly modify the META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file, search for mssql-jdbc-10.2.1.jre8.jar and replace it with mssql-jdbc-12.2.0 After running .jre11.jar, it will work. I tested it works fine.

title: NA
body: TKS

title: [Alarm notification optimization] <Alarm notification has poor recognition, it is recommended to optimize the language a little>
body:
### Description

目前的告警通知存在辨识度很低，导致要花很多经历观察告警，建议通过简单的醒目的icon、颜色来标识，一眼就能发现问题
1、目前告警样例
[HertzBeat告警通知]
告警目标对象 : available
所属监控ID : 196276883880192
所属监控名称 : http://www.abc.com/blog/home/index
告警级别 : 警告告警
告警触发时间 : 2023-05-06 11:46:09
内容详情 : 可用性告警恢复通知, 监控状态已恢复正常



[HertzBeat告警通知]
告警目标对象 : available
所属监控ID : 196276883880192
所属监控名称 : http://www.abc.com/blog/home/index
告警级别 : 紧急告警
告警触发时间 : 2023-05-06 11:45:08
内容详情 : 监控紧急可用性告警: UN_CONNECTABLE

2、建议优化样例：调整监控名称顺序，新增状态恢复UTF 文字图标
[✅设备恢复]
所属监控名称 : http://www.abc.com/blog/home/index
告警目标对象 : available
所属监控ID : 196276883880192
告警级别 : 警告告警
告警触发时间 : 2023-05-06 11:46:09
内容详情 : 可用性告警恢复通知, 监控状态已恢复正常


[🔴设备告警]

title: [BUG] <HertzBeat v1.3.1 threshold rule function is very good, but it is still recommended to add the alarm function after recovery>
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

当一个监控项中断时间较长，按照现有的监控规则，会每隔一段时间，可能是6分钟或者8分钟，就会报警一次，直至该监控恢复，这样就会导致频繁产生垃圾告警通知行为
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16797633/236731090-4e1d5456-0d37-4673-a937-5f5471029027.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16797633/236732694-e2e48b8f-8b21-4676-87dd-185dbc8b88a7.png)


### Expected Behavior

建议告警后，仅发一次，后续仍有告警的话，忽略，直至恢复再发一次告警。

### Steps To Reproduce
每产生一个告警，判断一下上次的状态，如果已经发过告警了，就不发了，直至恢复

_No response_

### Environment

```markdown
v1.3.1
```


### Debug logs

·

### Anything else?

title: [Question] <Question about zookeeper monitoring>
body:
### Question

存在的疑问：
1. `zk`的监控是基于`nc`命令来实现的，那为什么还会需要基于`ssh`协议？
2. 现在的内置`zk`监控模板`app-zookeeper.yml`，在基于`ssh`协议的基础上，执行的诸如`echo mntr | nc 121.40.113.44 2181`命令，是不正确的，如果需要监控多台`zk`，每个都需要改对应的`ip地址`，也就是说需要重新自定义监控来实现。为何不直接通过变量的形式控制即可？

我的个人考虑，是否应该直接支持`nc`协议，不需要`over ssh`会更合理一些？

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Existing doubts:
1. The monitoring of `zk` is implemented based on the `nc` command, so why is it still based on the `ssh` protocol?
2. The current built-in `zk` monitoring template `app-zookeeper.yml`, based on the `ssh` protocol, executes commands such as `echo mntr | nc 121.40.113.44 2181`, which is incorrect. If necessary To monitor multiple `zk`, each needs to change the corresponding `ip address`, that is to say, it needs to re-customize the monitoring to achieve. Why not directly control it in the form of variables?

In my personal consideration, should the `nc` protocol be directly supported, and it would be more reasonable not to require `over ssh`?

title: NA
body: hi 谢谢反馈 看你的分析我觉得是的👍 欢迎贡献一波直接基于 `nc` 来监控zookeeper 或者看 zookeeper 有没有其他类似对外接口我们可以采集数据监控

body:
