----    
Hi, thank you for your feedback. I think it is based on your analysis 👍 Welcome to contribute a wave of monitoring zookeeper directly based on `nc` or see if zookeeper has other similar external interfaces that we can collect data monitoring

title: NA
body: 经过我的分析实验，`zookeeper`的监控完全可以基于`telnet`来实现和`nc`命令相同的效果。为了不增加系统复杂性，我扩展了项目里面的`telnet`协议，可以支持在`telnet`到指定端口后发送命令并解析响应结果。在这个基础上，可以实现`zookeeper`的监控，同时不需要`ssh`到对应的服务器上。具体实现我已经提交了`PR`，见 #957

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
After my analysis and experiments, the monitoring of `zookeeper` can be based on `telnet` to achieve the same effect as the `nc` command. In order not to increase the complexity of the system, I extended the `telnet` protocol in the project, which can support sending commands and parsing the response results after `telnet` reaches the specified port. On this basis, `zookeeper` monitoring can be realized without `ssh` to the corresponding server. I have submitted `PR` for specific implementation, see #957

body:
> 经过我的分析实验，`zookeeper`的监控完全可以基于`telnet`来实现和`nc`命令相同的效果。为了不增加系统复杂性，我扩展了项目里面的`telnet`协议，可以支持在`telnet`到指定端口后发送命令并解析响应结果。在这个基础上，可以实现`zookeeper`的监控，同时不需要`ssh`到对应的服务器上。具体实现我已经提交了`PR`，见 #957

title: [Question] <Monitoring address domain name verification logic question>
body:
### Question

理论上说，监控系统主要运行在内网环境，在一些企业内部，会存在内部域名。在不是很严谨的情况下，可能将一些常见字符（例如下划线）作为内部域名。这样会导致没法接入监控。我个人认为，可以考虑放开部分常见字符限制。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Theoretically speaking, the monitoring system mainly operates in the intranet environment, and in some enterprises, there will be internal domain names. In less rigorous cases, some common characters (such as underscore) may be used as internal domain names. This will result in inability to access monitoring. Personally, I think you can consider relaxing some common character restrictions.

Design Http Collect YML Format.
Add successCode field, the successCode means what http response status code we consider it collect success. 

```
    http:
      host: ^_^host^_^
      port: ^_^port^_^
      url: ^_^base_path^_^/health
      method: GET
      ssl: ^_^ssl^_^
      successCode: [200, 503]
      parseType: default
```

title: [Question] Can it be changed to a configurable item
body:
### Question

由于 HistoryJpaDatabaseDataStorage.MAX_HISTORY_TABLE_RECORD （ `private static final int MAX_HISTORY_TABLE_RECORD = 20_000;` ）的限制，

使用jpa或者mysql存储数据时，最大历史条数只能有20000条。导致历史记录只能记录很短的一个时间范围，能否把这个改成可配置项，由用户决定最大条数。

title: NA
body: hi 这里故意限制的，如果不限制存入H2数据库指标数据量，很容易因为数据库性能问题奔溃。所以我们文档都是建议大家使用配置时序数据库来存储指标数据，时序数据库无限制。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi This is intentionally limited. If you do not limit the amount of index data stored in the H2 database, it is easy to crash due to database performance problems. Therefore, our documents recommend that you use the configuration time series database to store indicator data, and there is no limit to the time series database.

title: NA
body:
有猜到限制的用意。
但对于mysql来说，以当前历史表结构，百万条数据以内应该都不足以构成性能问题。20000的限制还是有点太小了。
建议是可以配置，在配置项中注明风险，让使用者谨慎更改。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
There is an intention to guess the limit.
But for mysql, with the current historical table structure, less than one million pieces of data should not be enough to constitute a performance problem. The limit of 20000 is still a bit too small.
The suggestion is that it can be configured, and the risk is indicated in the configuration item, so that users can change it carefully.

body: 嗯嗯 可以提供一个配置项啥的让用户自己配置，有兴趣实现这个贡献一波PR吗

title: [Question] <Could you please confirm if this alert logic is supported: Trigger an alarm if no data is received within 90 seconds (for example)?>
body:
### Question

Could you please confirm if this alert logic is supported: Trigger an alarm if no data is received within 90 seconds (for example)?

title: NA
body: 可以通过配置监控的采集周期来控制90s触发时间。当监控不可用时会无数据，发出可用性监控告警。但是还不能对空数据进行阈值判断，我们想想这个怎么实现，理论可以通过实现一个配置阈值表达式的判断是否为空的函数来实现。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
The 90s trigger time can be controlled by configuring the monitoring acquisition period. When monitoring is unavailable, there will be no data, and an availability monitoring alarm will be issued. But it is still not possible to judge the threshold value of empty data. Let's think about how to realize this. In theory, it can be realized by implementing a function that configures the threshold expression to judge whether it is empty.

title: NA
body: Hi @tomsun28 ,我看代码好像request的header只有JWT token，但是token过期的时候，连userId都解析不出来，这样就无法在db里面删除过期的token数据。我的想法是在后端重新创建一个token pojo，给它分配一个id，前端传token的时候也可以把id传过来以便做数据库的增上改查，不知道这样是否可行？

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
Hi @tomsun28, I see the code as if the header of the request only has the JWT token, but when the token expires, even the userId cannot be parsed out, so the expired token data cannot be deleted in the db. My idea is to recreate a token pojo on the backend and assign it an id. When the token is passed on the front end, the id can also be passed over for the purpose of adding, modifying and checking the database. I wonder if this is feasible?

title: NA
body:
> Hi @tomsun28 ,我看代码好像request的header只有JWT token，但是token过期的时候，连userId都解析不出来，这样就无法在db里面删除过期的token数据。我的想法是在后端重新创建一个token pojo，给它分配一个id，前端传token的时候也可以把id传过来以便做数据库的增上改查，不知道这样是否可行？

hi 你的意思认证的时候需要传一个token和id吗，这样就不能符合openapi认证token规范了。你看这样行不行，可以设计一张已签发token的数据表，里面有字段 token，签发时间和过期时间等。用户签发token的删除应该是用户手动删除了，即使token过期的情况下，可以参考下GitHub Gitee 的token管理api。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
> Hi @tomsun28, I see the code as if the header of the request only has the JWT token, but when the token expires, even the userId cannot be parsed, so the expired token data cannot be deleted in the db. My idea is to recreate a token pojo on the backend and assign it an id. When the token is passed on the front end, the id can also be passed over for the purpose of adding, modifying and checking the database. I wonder if this is feasible?

Hi, do you mean that a token and id need to be passed during authentication, so that it cannot comply with the openapi authentication token specification. You can see if this works, you can design a data table of issued tokens, which contains fields token, issuance time and expiration time, etc. The deletion of the token issued by the user should be manually deleted by the user. Even if the token expires, you can refer to the token management api of GitHub Gitee.

My idea is to re-create a token pojo on the backend and assign it an id. When the token is passed on the front end, the id can also be passed over for the purpose of adding, modifying and checking the database. I wonder if this is feasible?
>
> hi Do you mean that a token and id need to be passed during authentication, so that it cannot comply with the openapi authentication token specification. You can see if this works, you can design a data table of issued tokens, which contains fields token, issuance time and expiration time, etc. The deletion of the token issued by the user should be manually deleted by the user. title: NA
body:
> 意思是用户登陆所使用的token和用户调用generateToken所获得token区分开吗？我觉得可行，hhh 而且是不是可以限制用户签发token的数量以防他疯狂签发

是的，这两个可以是不同的API，因为用户生成的token可以设置过期时间等参数，我们可以提供一套api供用户自定义token的管理。感觉应该限制下生成数量，这样的话一个是更安全，而且我们也不用去做分页了，可以限制8个或者10个左右。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
> Does it mean that the token used by the user to log in is different from the token obtained by the user calling generateToken? I think it is feasible, hhh and is it possible to limit the number of tokens issued by the user to prevent him from issuing them insanely?

Yes, these two can be different APIs, because the token generated by the user can set parameters such as expiration time, we can provide a set of APIs for user-defined token management. I feel that the number of generated should be limited, so that one is safer, and we don't need to do paging, we can limit about 8 or 10.

title: [Task] hertzbeat metrics collector cluster design
body:
### Description

### why collector cluster? 

- cluster means more powerful performance and can support monitoring more
- unified monitoring between different isolated networks, one hertzbeat can monitoring multi isolated networks resource.
- avoid single point of failure 

### desgin discuss

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/24788200/d7e6650e-5e22-484a-bc88-9fee47cbea81)


### Task List

_No response_

title: NA
body:
讨论存疑：
1. 采集后数据的存储位置？
    主hz（collector每次采集完需要将数据同步到主hz，需要处理各种丢包等问题，带宽使用高）
    collector模块自己存储（无法实现内网的collector，通过外网查询）
2. hz如何配置collector模块的地址？
    配置文件
    数据库
3. 心跳机制，collector向hz发送心跳还是hz向collector发送心跳？
4. hz如何响应collector模块的上线，注销，连接失败，重连接等问题？

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
Discussion in doubt:
1. Where is the collected data stored?
    Main hz (the collector needs to synchronize the data to the main hz after each collection, and needs to deal with various packet loss and other problems, and the bandwidth usage is high)
    The collector module stores itself (the collector of the intranet cannot be realized, and it can be queried through the external network)
2. How does hz configure the address of the collector module?
    configuration file
    database
3. Heartbeat mechanism, does the collector send a heartbeat to hz or does hz send a heartbeat to the collector?
4. How does hz respond to problems such as online, logout, connection failure, and reconnection of the collector module?

title: [Question] How to get in touch regarding a security concern?
body:
### Question

Hello 👋

I found a potential security issue in hertzbeat, how can I get in touch with you in a private way and submit my security report?

Could you add a SECURITY.md file with an e-mail address for me to send further details to? GitHub [recommends](https://docs.github.com/en/code-security/getting-started/adding-a-security-policy-to-your-repository) a security policy to ensure issues are responsibly disclosed, and it would help direct researchers in the future.

Linux宿主机版本：NAME="Rocky Linux" VERSION="8.7 (Green Obsidian)"
docker版本：Docker version 20.10.22, build 3a2c30b
docker compose版本：Docker Compose version v2.17.2

title: NA
body:
你的截图完全没有任何说服力，问题的根源在于，mysql 入库过程中，字段值存在特殊符号，需要做转义或者特殊编码，否则，会导致值写入出错。具体的字段值，是 SSL 证书信息的描述，存在换行符和双引号，这些特殊符号必须要转义。
---
Your screenshot is completely unconvincing. The root cause of the problem lies in the fact that during the process of storing data into MySQL, there are special characters present in the field values that need to be escaped or encoded properly; otherwise, it will result in writing errors. Specifically, these field values describe SSL certificate information and contain newline characters and double quotation marks. These special symbols must be escaped.

body:

### Current Behavior

【
{
	"jobs": [
		{
			"jid": "abbbbbbbbb",
			"name": "aaaaa",
			"state": "RUNNING",
			"start-time": 1687488064772,
			"end-time": -1,
			"duration": 441540547,
			"last-modification": 1687488082063,

				"total": 4,
				"created": 0,

				"running": 4,
				"finished": 0,

				"canceled": 0,
				"failed": 0,
				"reconciling": 0,
				"initializing": 0
			}
		}
	]
}
】
2.The returned result contains the last modification. I want to use jsonpath to obtain parameters for addition and subtraction, but it cannot be recognized. Whether it is # ` $. last modification 'or $. last modification, the result displayed in the foreground is   
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/30828520/7d95e6e1-1b00-42b6-8f4a-5ae36448b7b6)
3.These are some template parameters
【
 - name:  flink_details
    priority: 2
    fields:
      - field: responseTime
        type: 1
      - field: name
        instance: true
        type: 1
      - field: cccaaa
        type: 0
    aliasFields:
      - responseTime
      - $.name
      - $.start-time
      - $.last-modification
    calculates:
      - responseTime = responseTime
      - name =  $.name
      - cccaaa =  #`$.last-modification` - #`$.start-time`
    protocol: http
    http:
      host: ^_^host^_^
      port: ^_^port^_^
      url: /proxy/^_^uri^_^/jobs/overview
      timeout: ^_^timeout^_^
      method: GET
      ssl: ^_^ssl^_^
      authorization:
        type: ^_^authType^_^
        basicAuthUsername: ^_^username^_^
        basicAuthPassword: ^_^password^_^
        digestAuthUsername: ^_^username^_^
        digestAuthPassword: ^_^password^_^
      parseType: jsonPath
      parseScript: '$.jobs.*' 
】

Obtain the values of start-time and last-modification for subtraction operation

1. flink version:1.5.4

no

title: NA
body:
The root cause of this issue is that for `$.start-time`,Avitor will treat `$` as a variable and `start-time` is its member variables.
So from my perspective, if this response is returned by offcial API, maybe you can change the parseType, if this response is returned by your designed API, maybe you can change the variables names @tomsun28 @san346596324

title: NA

This is the official API provided by flink. I can't modify it, but from the template point of view, as long as there are fields containing - in the calculates, it should not work properly. I tried parseType: default, but it seems that it cannot parse the array

Hi @tomsun28 @san346596324 , I found that the root cause of this issue is because YAML treats `#` as slash-slash comment， and YAML will not parse this part

![yml](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/50475131/890191aa-e3cc-4acd-81ed-b2c84fd2b59f)


 the `$.start-time - $.last-modification` was commented out...

title: [Question] support deploy  behind a proxy like nginx ?
body:
### Question

does hertzbeat support deploy behind a proxy like nginx ?  

I tried it, if the contextpath is added, the application cannot be used normally, and the resource paths are all wrong

maybe we can add a server.basePath configuration like kibana?

server.basePath:
Enables you to specify a path to mount Kibana at if you are running behind a proxy. This only affects the URLs generated by Kibana, your proxy is expected to remove the basePath value before forwarding requests to Kibana. This setting cannot end in a slash (/).

title: NA
body:
hi, hertzbeat support deploy behind a proxy like nginx. 

> maybe we can add a server.basePath configuration like kibana?

maybe you can try config the `application.yml` file
```
server:
  port: 1157
  servlet:
    context-path: /demo
```

title: [BUG] When using HTTP get requests, the params configuration parameters cannot interface properly
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

1.When using HTTP get requests, the params configuration parameters cannot interface properly
2.The data obtained by the interface is the same as without passing parameters
3.After investigation, I found that I was using the time format yyyy mm dd hh: mm: ss, which contains spaces. The parameter was already escaped when saving the incoming interface, resulting in the parameter being used in the hertzbeat backend to dock with the escaped data in the interface. Therefore, the parameter is incorrect

title: SSL UN_REACHABLE , the service is abroad, the network delay is too high, resulting in occasional errors in SSL monitoring
body:
### Question

如何自定义SSL 监控超时时间？

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

How to customize the SSL monitoring timeout?

title: NA
body:
hi 可以参考下 `Http Api`的监控模版定义，给SSL监控新增 `timeout`参数，然后在新增SSL监控页面的时候设置参数值即可

```
params:
  - field: timeout
    # name-param field display i18n name
    # name-参数字段显示名称
    name:
      zh-CN: 超时时间(ms)
      en-US: Timeout(ms)
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input type)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: number
    # required-true or false
    # required-是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: false
    # hide param-true or false
    # 是否隐藏字段 true or false
    hide: true
    # field-param field key
    # field-变量字段标识
```

```
    http:
      # http host: ipv4 ipv6 domain
      host: ^_^host^_^
      # http port
      port: ^_^port^_^
      # http url
      url: ^_^uri^_^
      # http connect timeout
      timeout: ^_^timeout^_^
```

对于因网络抖动偶发链接失败的情况，建议在阈值配置那里对这个监控类型的可用性阈值的触发次数设置3次，这样连续3次失败才会真正判定为失败告警。

title: [BUG] <The routelink queryParams corresponding to the dashboard catagory is inaccurate>
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

web-app\src\app\routes\dashboard\dashboard.component.html，routerLink‘/monitors' 对应的queryParams应该是catagory而不是app.因为appCountService.size、appCountService.availableSize、appCountService.unAvailableSize和appCountService.unManageSize 4个数值对应的类型都是catagory不是app，但点击链接时指向的是app=website。
例如service监控有11个，website监控10个、api监控1个，当我点击应用监控（service）时，只能查到10个（website)结果，会使用户产生歧义。
html比较容易修改，但是monitors接口应该是不支持catagory=service作为queryParams。

_No response_

首页dashboard，点击应用监控（service）,如果添加了多个service类型的监控指标，则只能查询到app=website的list，而不是所有service类型的list

title: [BUG] <The startup process should not have to read all files under define>
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

我碰到一个事件如下：
我的目录权限是非root，但是在进行自定义监控时候，在define目录下面创建了一个root权限的.yml监控示例文件，导致软件无法启动，报错
![5e4d281e60db41ba40cfcac1fab3463](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/10276100/277959df-8bd3-4869-ae51-b80000040c6d)
我删除了这个文件之后，依然无法启动，然后发现还有个隐藏的.yml.swp文件存在，也是root权限，导致无法启动，删除之后软件恢复正常。

建议软件启动可以跳过权限不正确、配置不正确的文件，然后日志中能提示。

### Expected Behavior

应该是跳过权限不正确的文件。

我的目录权限是非root，但是在进行自定义监控时候，在define目录下面创建了一个root权限的.yml监控示例文件，导致软件无法启动，报错

建议软件启动可以跳过权限不正确、配置不正确的文件，然后日志中能提示。


我的目录权限是非root，但是在进行自定义监控时候，在define目录下面创建了一个root权限的.yml监控示例文件，导致软件无法启动，报错

### Current Behavior

My directory permission is non-root, but when performing custom monitoring, a .yml monitoring sample file with root permission was created under the define directory, which caused the software to fail to start and an error was reported
![5e4d281e60db41ba40cfcac1fab3463](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/10276100/277959df-8bd3-4869-ae51-b80000040c6d)
After I deleted this file, it still failed to start, and then I found that there was a hidden .yml.swp file, which was also rooted, which made it impossible to start. After deleting, the software returned to normal.

It is recommended that the software can skip files with incorrect permissions and incorrect configurations when starting the software, and then there will be prompts in the log.

### Expected Behavior

It should be skipping files with incorrect permissions.

### Steps To Reproduce

二、在告警收敛功能里面，如果配置了5分钟的收敛，效果不好，结果如下

title: [Question] <title> Unable to obtain disk information of win system
body:
### Question

系统信息：1903版本，内部版本18362.1256。无法获取系统的磁盘信息，尝试获取其他的磁盘信息，发现oid中带有2021的大多都无法访问。![信息图片](https://github.com/lfandrh/figure/blob/master/test/%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE.png)

title: NA
body:
1.标题中提到的问题解决了，磁盘信息可以在存储信息里面找到。

2.存储信息不仅包括了磁盘信息，还包括了内存信息，使用中遇到的一个问题是内存使用率超过100%，原因是使用了虚拟内存的已使用大小去除以了物理内存的大小，可以将src/main/resources/define/app-windows.yml有关内存的oid修改为：
`hrMemorySize: 1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.2.0`
 `hrStorageUsed: 1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.3.1.6.6`
 `hrStorageAllocationUnits: 1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.3.1.4.6`
这样就是物理内存大小及其已使用大小来求其使用率了。

3.使用存储信息里面的磁盘信息对磁盘的使用率进行监控，因为存储信息包含了虚拟内存和物理内存的使用率，所以会出现误报的情况，在设置阈值时，可以额外添加两条规则来避免这种情况：
`descr    不等于    Virtual Memory`
`descr    不等于    Physical Memory`

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
1. The problem mentioned in the title is solved, and the disk information can be found in the storage information.

2. Storage information includes not only disk information, but also memory information. One problem encountered during use is that the memory usage rate exceeds 100%. The reason is that the used size of virtual memory is divided by the size of physical memory. Modify the memory-related oid in src/main/resources/define/app-windows.yml to:
`hrMemorySize: 1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.2.0`
 `hrStorageUsed: 1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.3.1.6.6`
 `hrStorageAllocationUnits: 1.3.6.1.2.1.25.2.3.1.4.6`
This is the physical memory size and its used size to find its usage.

3. Use the disk information in the storage information to monitor the disk usage. Because the storage information includes the usage of virtual memory and physical memory, there will be false positives. When setting the threshold, you can add two additional rules to avoid this:
`descr is not equal to Virtual Memory`
`descr is not equal to Physical Memory`

refer endpoint api `/api/alerts/report`

title: [BUG] <When the monitoring center selects a custom tag, if the tagvalue is empty, return a 409 error>
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

监控中心选择自定义标签时，如果tagvalue为空返回409错误。
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/6ea29771-8e39-4893-b1f4-f3b4b9bc0eb4)
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/e5621438-4ca6-488a-9a65-86cc09798867)
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/3d0403ea-c0b0-4c78-abef-a8043642b8b5)
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/6aa5767d-0284-4589-8ffc-3b20d3d2b66d)
查看代码尝试解决该问题，限于能力不足未能修复😄

### Expected Behavior

自定义标签的四种情况：
①tagname："name"，tagvalue："value"。测试结果：正常
②tagname："name"，tagvalue：null。测试结果：409（前端）；Index 1 out of bounds for length 1（后端）
③tagname："name:"，tagvalue："value"。测试结果：结果为空
④tagname："name:"，tagvalue：null。测试结果：409（前端）；Index 1 out of bounds for length 1（后端）
对于情况②④，推测由于tagvalue值为空，tagArr length为1，导致tagValue = tagArr[1]获取不到。
对于情况③，推测由于tagname包含了”:"，程序将该":"判断为分隔符，所以没有正确识别到tagname和tagvalue。

验证图片
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/02b02e02-5714-4b9b-b40c-3738f676342c)
绑定3个标签
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/889ec472-2619-4e5e-9ed5-49bf3e87499b)
标签1：无标签值，报409
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/666d5c12-8ab9-4a21-9fb9-dba3032c419e)
标签2：有标签值，正常
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/6c609355-a43f-416c-9fad-d798513ea17d)
标签3：标签名含：且标签值有值，查询结果为空
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/60596094/fef605b9-cd23-4168-8f4b-7430565dce7f)



### Steps To Reproduce

1、标签管理中新增标签名为tagname，标签值为空，点确定保存。
2、在监控中心选择一个实例，并绑定新增的标签
3、在监控中心点击该实例对应新增的标签，前端报409，日志打印Index 1 out of bounds for length 1


### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(s):1.3.2 docker
```


### Debug logs

2023-07-19 16:43:20.273 [http-nio-1157-exec-7] ERROR org.dromara.hertzbeat.manager.support.GlobalExceptionHandler Line:199 - [monitor]-[unknown error happen]-Index 1 out of bounds for length 1

title: [Question] <title>Pay attention to the value and other fields when importing and monitoring through ymal files in batches: spaces need to be added later, and UTF8 is required when the character set is required
body:
### Question

通过批量导入ymal文件发现报错
![04cebe6f5c4af8b4e615f66f6f2ebf2](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/10276100/326342d4-36fb-41ef-b392-d672c9b34420)
一个是ymal文件保存的时候字符集需要是utf8，还有一个问题要注意填写的字段的冒号后面需要有一个空格，注意这两点一般导入就没啥问题了。或者使用excel来导入。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Errors are found by importing ymal files in batches
![04cebe6f5c4af8b4e615f66f6f2ebf2](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/10276100/326342d4-36fb-41ef-b392-d672c9b34420)
One is that the character set needs to be utf8 when the ymal file is saved, and there is another problem that needs to be noted that there needs to be a space after the colon in the filled field. Note that these two points are generally imported without any problems. Or use excel to import.

title: Monitoring template yml file suggestion
body:
监控模板yml文件建议

自定义监控模板yml文件配置过于复杂，建议开发者们提供个自定义监控模板yml共享平台，可以让用户上传自己配置好的 yml文件让更多用户更快捷方便监控各种平台资源，谢谢！

The custom monitoring template yml file configuration is too complicated. title: [BUG] 登陆漏洞与隐患，请大大协助修复，避免影响扩大
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

HertzBeat监控系统任意登录漏洞，麻烦协助
1、伪造登陆+token
输入admin账号，密码随意输入，点击登录，替换返回数据包为：

title: NA
body:
hi 感谢反馈👍
1. 伪造后台token成功是因为密钥相同导致的，可以在 application.yml 修改 sureness.jwt.secret 为自定义的密钥 
```yaml
sureness:
  auths:
    - digest
    - basic
    - jwt
  jwt:
    secret: 'CyaFv0bwq2Eik0jdrKUtsA6bx3sDJeFV643R
             LnfKefTjsIfJLBa2YkhEqEGtcHDTNe4CU6+9
             8tVt4bisXQ13rbN0oxhUZR73M6EByXIO+SV5
             dKhaX0csgOCTlCxq20yhmUea6H6JIpSE2Rwp'
```

这块确实有问题，我们应该在对用户没有修改密钥的情况下，日志ERROR提醒修改为自定义的密钥

2.当用户进入系统后，他是并不能查看到真实的监控密码参数的，因为我们对每个监控密码参数都做了加密保护，页面显示的是一个加密后的密码串

我看页面应该版本比较老了 建议升级最新版本

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi thanks for the feedback 👍
1. The successful forgery of the background token is caused by the same key, you can modify the sureness.jwt.secret in application.yml to a custom key
```yaml
sureness:
  auths:
    -digest
    - basic
    - jwt
  jwt:
    secret: 'CyaFv0bwq2Eik0jdrKUtsA6bx3sDJeFV643R
             LnfKefTjsIfJLBa2YkhEqEGtcHDTNe4CU6+9
             8tVt4bisXQ13rbN0oxhUZR73M6EByXIO+SV5
             dKhaX0csgOCTlCxq20yhmUea6H6JIpSE2Rwp'
```

There is indeed a problem with this piece. We should change the log ERROR to a custom key without modifying the key for the user.

2. When the user enters the system, he cannot view the real monitoring password parameters, because we have encrypted and protected each monitoring password parameter, and the page displays an encrypted password string

I think the version of the page should be relatively old, it is recommended to upgrade to the latest version

> 
> 我看页面应该版本比较老了 建议升级最新版本

收到，非常感谢，我们安排升级和修改密钥。

title: [Task] <Development of custom template configuration for message notification>
body:
### Description

HertzBeat supports many alarm methods, but the content of message notification is basically solidified and not very extensible, and it is hard-coded in the project through Thymeleaf. In order to meet the various notification needs of different users, we hope to design and implement a notification template management page, which allows users to customize the notification template and choose different templates while selecting the notification method.
Related UI pages：
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/68422437/8bd2aec4-fc4e-43ab-a49a-bbf341a68eea)


### Task List

1. Design a universal template.
2. Design and implement the notification template configuration management page, and users can configure the template on the UI page.
3. The notification template adaptation supports the content of various notification methods such as nailing, WeChat, email, telegram, discord, etc.

title: NA
body:
> 麻烦顺带贴一下hzb_tag的表结构

标签我没用，数据是空的。
```sql
CREATE TABLE `hzb_tag`  (
  `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'TAG ID',
  `name` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'TAG标签名称',
  `value` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'TAG标签值(可为空)',
  `type` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '标记类型 0:监控自动生成(monitorId,monitorName) 1: 用户生成 2: 系统预制',
  `color` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT '#ffffff' COMMENT '标签颜色',
  `creator` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者',
  `modifier` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最新修改者',
  `gmt_create` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'create time',
  `gmt_update` datetime NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'update time',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE,
  UNIQUE INDEX `unique_tag`(`name` ASC, `value` ASC) USING BTREE
) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 45 CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
```


title: NA
body:
> 奇怪，hzb_tag这个表里面有数据，这表不是对应管理后台里的标签管理吗。那边列表是空，为什么表里有数据？

添加监控时默认会往hzb_tag表插入两行数据，name为monitorId和monitorName，看这个报错应该是插入hzb_tag表时name和value重复了，表结构存在：UNIQUE INDEX `unique_tag`(`name` ASC, `value` ASC) USING BTREE。
不清楚怎么走到插入hzb_tag那边的。org.dromara.hertzbeat.manager.service.MonitorService#validate会判断监控的name不能重复的，而且我也没有复现出来你这个问题（新建和修改都试过了）
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/48920254/d13dd459-ab4b-40dd-9350-1dce18f1a358)

你这代码判断是在monitor表里是否有同名。但是异常是出在hzb_tag表。是不是删除监控时漏删了hzb_tag表里数据？另外这两张有中间表也要删把

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
> > Strange, there is data in the hzb_tag table, isn't this table corresponding to the tag management in the management background. The list over there is empty, why is there data in the table?
>
> When adding a monitor, two rows of data will be inserted into the hzb_tag table by default. The name is monitorId and monitorName. This error should be that the name and value are repeated when inserting into the hzb_tag table. The table structure exists: UNIQUE INDEX `unique_tag`(`name` ASC, `value` ASC) USING BTREE. I don't know how to get to the side where hzb_tag is inserted. org.dromara.hertzbeat.manager.service.MonitorService#validate will judge that the monitored name cannot be repeated, and I have not reproduced your problem (I have tried both new creation and modification) ![image](https:// user-images.githubusercontent.com/48920254/258685846-d13dd459-ab4b-40dd-9350-1dce18f1a358.png)

Your code judges whether there is the same name in the monitor table. But the exception is in the hzb_tag table. Is the data in the hzb_tag table omitted when deleting the monitoring? In addition, the two intermediate tables should also be deleted.

> > > 奇怪，hzb_tag这个表里面有数据，这表不是对应管理后台里的标签管理吗。那边列表是空，为什么表里有数据？
> > 
> > 
> > 添加监控时默认会往hzb_tag表插入两行数据，name为monitorId和monitorName，看这个报错应该是插入hzb_tag表时name和value重复了，表结构存在：UNIQUE INDEX `unique_tag`(`name` ASC, `value` ASC) USING BTREE。 不清楚怎么走到插入hzb_tag那边的。org.dromara.hertzbeat.manager.service.MonitorService#validate会判断监控的name不能重复的，而且我也没有复现出来你这个问题（新建和修改都试过了） ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48920254/258685846-d13dd459-ab4b-40dd-9350-1dce18f1a358.png)
> 
> 你这代码判断是在monitor表里是否有同名。但是异常是出在hzb_tag表。是不是删除监控时漏删了hzb_tag表里数据？另外这两张有中间表也要删把

代码是判断monitor表同名，问题是同名了直接抛异常了呀，不会走到下面插入hzb_tag表的操作；现在逻辑就是不支持插入同名的监控，按你这个描述走到代码位置就结束了，返回之前截图的报错，不是tag表插入失败的报错。
所以我也不知道你描述的情况是怎么走到下面插入tag表流程的，你可以先看一下数据库数据吧，可能存在你说的monitor表数据删了，tag表数据没删除的情况

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
> > > Strange, hzb_tag has data in the table, isn't this table corresponding to the tag management in the management background. The list over there is empty, why is there data in the table?
> >
> >
> > When adding a monitor, two rows of data will be inserted into the hzb_tag table by default. The name is monitorId and monitorName. This error should be that the name and value are repeated when inserting into the hzb_tag table. The table structure exists: UNIQUE INDEX `unique_tag`(`name` ASC , `value` ASC) USING BTREE. I don't know how to get to the side where hzb_tag is inserted. org.dromara.hertzbeat.manager.service.MonitorService#validate will judge that the monitored name cannot be repeated, and I have not reproduced your problem (I have tried both new creation and modification) ![image](https:// user-images.githubusercontent.com/48920254/258685846-d13dd459-ab4b-40dd-9350-1dce18f1a358.png)
>
> Your code judges whether there is the same name in the monitor table. But the exception is in the hzb_tag table. Is the data in the hzb_tag table omitted when deleting the monitoring? In addition, the two intermediate tables should also be deleted.

The code is to judge that the monitor table has the same name. The problem is that if the name is the same, an exception will be thrown directly. It will not go to the operation of inserting the hzb_tag table below; the current logic does not support the insertion of monitors with the same name. According to your description, it will be over when you go to the code position. The error reported in the previous screenshot is returned, not the error reported by the tag table insertion failure.
So I don’t know how the situation you described led to the process of inserting the tag table below. You can look at the database data first. There may be cases where the data in the monitor table you mentioned was deleted but the data in the tag table was not deleted.

title: [Task] <Suggestions for improving the alarm notification policy>
body:
### Description

Alarm notification policy for this scenario: Alarms affecting database operation shall be sent to Party A, row lock and deadlock of database shall be sent to development and rectification, unavailable monitoring shall be sent to DBA for troubleshooting, or problems involving different businesses in the same set of database shall be sent to contact persons of different departments for handling. It is recommended that you add an alarm with a corresponding ID when adding an alarm to the threshold alarm. Then you can select a specific alarm ID when configuring the notification policy and send it to the corresponding personnel for processing

### Task List

_No response_

title: [Task] <Monitor Indicator Switch>
body:
### Description

Since many indicators are configured, some indicators can be enabled for collection in case of transmission failure. If they are continuously executed at ordinary times, the performance of the monitored database will be affected. It is recommended to set an indicator switch to disable certain indicators at ordinary times and enable them when necessary. Because all oracle will monitor the same indicators, but different businesses, different failures, different time periods may need to focus on different indicators, some indicators can be temporarily not monitored

### Task List

_No response_

title: [Task] [Suggest] Added one-click test monitoring results and export report function
body:
### Description

## 建议功能：
在现有的 hertzbeat 项目中，添加一个功能，允许用户根据已添加的监控或配置，**一键测试监控结果**，并能够导出结果报告为 HTML 或 PDF 格式。

## 背景：
在一些场景下，我们可能无法或不方便部署监控服务器来运行 hertzbeat。然而，定期进行服务器运维是必要的，而手动处理这些任务可能会耗费大量时间和精力。通过添加这个功能，用户可以轻松地将 hertzbeat 配置打包为一个运行包或命令工具，从而脱离依赖环境。用户只需将运行包插入运维机器，按需执行监控配置，实现省时省力的运维过程。

## 预期实现：

在 hertzbeat 界面中添加一个 "一键测试" 或类似的按钮。
用户点击该按钮后，hertzbeat 将根据已添加的监控配置执行测试。
测试完成后，用户可以选择导出结果报告，支持导出为 HTML 或 PDF 格式。
这个功能将为用户提供便利，减少手动运维的工作量，当然也增强 hertzbeat 的实用性。

### Task List

_No response_

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Description

## Suggested features:
In the existing hertzbeat project, add a function that allows users to **one-click test monitoring results** according to the added monitoring or configuration, and can export the result report to HTML or PDF format.

## background:
In some scenarios, it may not be possible or convenient for us to deploy a monitoring server to run hertzbeat. However, regular server maintenance is necessary, and handling these tasks manually can consume a lot of time and effort. By adding this feature, users can easily package the hertzbeat configuration as a runtime package or command tool, thereby breaking away from the dependent environment. Users only need to insert the running package into the operation and maintenance machine, and perform monitoring configuration on demand, realizing a time-saving and labor-saving operation and maintenance process.

## Expected implementation:

Add a "One Click Test" or similar button to the hertzbeat interface.
After the user clicks the button, hertzbeat will execute the test according to the added monitoring configuration.
After the test is completed, the user can choose to export the result report, which supports exporting to HTML or PDF format.
This feature will provide convenience to users, reduce the workload of manual operation and maintenance, and of course enhance the practicability of hertzbeat.

### Task List

_No response_

title: [Task] [Suggest] Support the addition of one-click execution function without dependency environment
body:
### Description

## 建议功能：
为 hertzbeat 添加一个功能，使其能够脱离依赖环境，支持在不需要额外监控服务器的情况下，一键执行监控配置。

## 背景：
在一些情况下，没有额外的监控服务器可供使用，或者部署监控服务器不切实际。为了满足这些场景的需求，希望 hertzbeat 可以提供一种方式，使其可以在不依赖复杂环境的情况下运行。

## 预期实现：
开发一个**命令行工具**，用户可以将 hertzbeat 配置和测试的数据按照规范整理起来，用该命令行工具执行。
用户可以将这个命令行工具部署到运维机器，甚至是 U 盘等存储设备中。
用户执行命令行工具时，工具会根据配置自动执行相应的监控测试，并将结果报告生成为 HTML 或 PDF 格式，参考 #1171 。
通过这个功能，用户可以更灵活地执行监控配置，无需担心复杂的依赖环境。

## 思考
这个和 hertzbeat 的 docker 运行环境大体相似，但是并不完全相同，毕竟不能随便装 docker 到处跑，但是恰恰是命令行工具，重点是执行监控的测试结果，所以很多可视化的东西以及这些依赖的东西都不需要。

此条反馈与 #1171  整体是 1 个功能衍生出来的，但是从功能角度各有不同，故分开反馈。


### Task List

_No response_

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Description

## Suggested features:
Add a function to hertzbeat so that it can break away from the dependent environment and support one-click monitoring configuration without the need for an additional monitoring server.

## background:
In some cases, no additional monitoring server is available, or it is impractical to deploy a monitoring server. In order to meet the needs of these scenarios, it is hoped that hertzbeat can provide a way to run without relying on a complex environment.

## Expected implementation:
Develop a **command line tool**, users can organize hertzbeat configuration and test data according to the specification, and use this command line tool to execute.
Users can deploy this command-line tool to operation and maintenance machines, or even storage devices such as U disks.
When the user executes the command-line tool, the tool will automatically execute the corresponding monitoring test according to the configuration, and generate the result report in HTML or PDF format, refer to #1171.
With this function, users can perform monitoring configuration more flexibly without worrying about complex dependency environments.

## think
This is roughly similar to hertzbeat's docker operating environment, but it is not exactly the same. After all, you can't just install docker to run around, but it is just a command line tool. The focus is on the test results of execution monitoring, so many visual things and these dependent things are unnecessary.

This feedback and #1171 are derived from one function as a whole, but they are different from the function point of view, so they are reported separately.


### Task List

_No response_

这个小工具可能是我们想做的方向不一样，且和hertzbeat本身脱离了没有关系，感觉适合新开一个项目来做，但我们目前不会有这样的考虑，抱歉。可以找一下现有应该有类似的监控脚本命令行工具。

I feel that the function you mentioned is a bit like one-click inspection, which independently executes an inspection tool independently of the monitoring system to monitor the current host resources and then generate an inspection report.
This small tool may be in a different direction than what we want to do, and it has nothing to do with hertzbeat itself. It feels suitable for a new project, but we will not have such considerations at the moment, sorry. You can look for existing command line tools that should have similar monitoring scripts.

Cause by application.yml missing config, as follows
```yml
    scheduler:

        enabled: true
        port: 1158
```

title: [Question] <Does HertzBeat port 1158 not support Nginx forwarding>
body:
### Question

因在实际使用中，HertzBeat 1157 端口是使用Nginx进行反代访问，在新版本中发现Collector Cluster 1158 端口若使用Nginx转发的情况下，下游部署的采集器会持续占用系统CPU及RAM，且会产生非常多的日志（启动1分钟大概160MB日志）

![b4759a625c602eda4344513f38b08ec](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/131239856/cc65e4bf-8bca-46d6-bd79-21ae2e6e8129)

部分日志内容：
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/131239856/e9c8cc7a-fa5e-405d-9e21-f6c6b1086e32)
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/131239856/38ec51ba-435b-4ee3-82af-afe211d8d653)

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Because in actual use, HertzBeat 1157 port uses Nginx for reverse generation access. In the new version, it is found that if Collector Cluster 1158 port is forwarded by Nginx, the collector deployed downstream will continue to occupy the system CPU and RAM, and will generate A lot of logs (about 160MB logs in 1 minute after startup)

![b4759a625c602eda4344513f38b08ec](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/131239856/cc65e4bf-8bca-46d6-bd79-21ae2e6e8129)

Part of the log content:
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/131239856/e9c8cc7a-fa5e-405d-9e21-f6c6b1086e32)
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/131239856/38ec51ba-435b-4ee3-82af-afe211d8d653)

title: NA
body: hi 看日志报错是压缩格式不支持nginx转发好像，下游采集器持续CPU 内存增大我们这边研究复现下，如果是非nginx转发而是直连 会有CPU内存异常这种情况吗，这个环境采集器的大概的监控数量是多少哦

Hi, you can check whether the port 1158 of the main hertzbeat machine is open, whether the firewall, and the IP network can connect to those

title: NA
body:
> 



> hi 可以排查下主hertzbeat的机器它的1158端口有没有开放，防火墙，还有IP网络是否能连通那些

感谢，问题已解决。
两个问题导致的失败： 
1. docker 启动的时候没有加 --net=host，导致 collector 访问不到 manager
2. IDENTITY 同名，导致页面上显示不出来采集器

用以下方法启动问题解决
docker run -d --net=host \
    -e IDENTITY=hertzbeat-collector-01 \
    -e MANAGER_IP=10.1.*.* \
    -e MANAGER_PORT=1158 \
    --name hertzbeat-collector tancloud/hertzbeat-collector

title: [Question] <About managing collector cluster management>
body:
### Question

在使用过程中会出现想要删除采集器集群重新注册，或同一个采集器集群名字更换机器进行注册、限定某个集群的调度任务数量上下限等等，但目前没有在Web页面中找到管理配置采集器集群的地方。

请问现在想要删除采集器集群是否只能够直接删除hzb_collector表中的数据？有没有考虑过加上删除集群和管理集群等功能？

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

In the process of use, you may want to delete the collector cluster and re-register, or change the name of the same collector cluster to register, limit the upper and lower limits of the number of scheduling tasks for a cluster, etc., but currently no management configuration can be found on the web page The location of the collector cluster.

Can I just delete the data in the hzb_collector table if I want to delete the collector cluster now? Have you considered adding functions such as deleting clusters and managing clusters?

title: [Question] <Threshold alarm recovery notification>
body:
### Question

目前HertzBeat的告警恢复通知，当监控可用性发生变化时才会发出，但对于阈值变化恢复时没有相对应的恢复通知

例如监控主机资源的CPU使用情况时，若设置的阈值为CPU使用率的80%，在某个时刻点超过了阈值导致告警，一个小时后回落到正常水平时，只发出一条 CPU使用率告警的通知，机器是否恢复正常只有后台管理员或机器的运维人员才能得知

请问是否有计划添加相关功能？

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

At present, HertzBeat's alarm recovery notification will only be issued when the monitoring availability changes, but there is no corresponding recovery notification for the recovery of the threshold change

For example, when monitoring the CPU usage of host resources, if the set threshold is 80% of the CPU usage, an alarm is generated when the threshold is exceeded at a certain point, and only one CPU usage alarm is issued when it falls back to the normal level after an hour. Notification, whether the machine is back to normal can only be known by the background administrator or the operation and maintenance personnel of the machine

Is there any plan to add related functions?

title: NA
body: Sorry，已看见在阈值设置中新增了恢复通知选项

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
Sorry, I have seen that the recovery notification option has been added to the threshold settings

title: [BUG] <Ping timeout is automatically reset to 65535>

title: NA
body:
```
    name:
      zh-CN: Ping超时时间(ms)
      en-US: Ping Timeout(ms)
    # type-param field type(most mapping the html input type)
    # type-字段类型,样式(大部分映射input标签type属性)
    type: number
    # when type is number, range is required
    # 当type为number时,用range表示范围
    range: '[0,100000]'
    # required-true or false
    # 是否是必输项 true-必填 false-可选
    required: true
    # default value 6000
    # 默认值 6000
    defaultValue: 6000
```
有许多type为number但range不为'[0,65535]'复用了同一个组件，前端限制为 [nzMin]="-1000" [nzMax]="65535" ，有什么好的想法解决这个问题吗？或许我可以帮忙修复它。

title: NA
body: @qyaaaa great! thanks.

title: [Task] Monitoring Template Yml Metrics I18n | 监控模版指标名称任务认领
body: ### Description **Monitoring Template Yml Metrics I18n Task** > 监控模版指标国际化任务认领 Hi guys, in the past, the `Metrics Name` of `HertzBeat` monitoring details could only display the English field, and could not support the configuration to display international name aliases such as English and Chinese. We are very glad that this version supports it. We have configured the internationalized name of the metrics into the monitoring template YML of each monitoring type. Because there are too many monitoring templates and the translation of the metrics name of each monitoring type needs to be considered, so I ask for your help here. Interested partners are welcome to cooperate and contribute to the internationalization of the monitoring template metrics translation. Thanks! > 小伙伴们大家好，之前`HertzBeat`的监控详情的`指标名称`只能展示英文指标field字段，无法支持配置展示英文中文等国际化名称别名。很高兴这个版本我们对其支持了，指标的国际化名称我们将其配置到了各个监控类型的监控模版YML中。因为监控模版实在太多且每个监控类型的指标名称翻译都需要考量，所以在这里请求大家的帮助，欢迎感兴趣的小伙伴协作贡献大家一起把监控模版指标翻译国际化做好。谢谢，爱心💗！ Demo before: After Metrics I18n: ### Task List Just comment on the corresponding task under this issue, and one PR corresponds to one monitoring template YML. as follows: > 领取方式，在本 issues 下评论对应任务即可，一个PR对应一个监控模版YML。如下: - [x] Metrics I18n https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app-zookeeper.yml ``` - [x] Metrics I18n https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/manager/src/main/resources/define/app-zookeeper.yml ``` Add i18n translation content under the metrics group and fields, for example: `i18n.zh-CN: CPU 信息 i18n.en-US: CPU Info`, English and Chinese are required, please pay attention to format alignment. 在指标组和指标下面添加i18n翻译内容, 例如：`i18n.zh-CN: CPU 信息 i18n.en-US: CPU Info`，需支持英文和中文，请注意格式对齐。 Example: ``` - name: cpu i18n: zh-CN: CPU 信息 en-US: CPU Info priority: 1 fields: - field: info type: 1 i18n: zh-CN: 型号 en-US: Info - field: cores type: 0 i18n: zh-CN: 核数 en-US: Cores - field: interrupt type: 0 i18n: zh-CN: 中断数 en-US: Interrupt - field: load type: 1 i18n: zh-CN: 负载 en-US: Load - field: context_switch type: 0 i18n: zh-CN: 上下文切换 en-US: Context Switch - field: usage type: 0 unit: '%' i18n: zh-CN: 使用率 en-US: Usage ``` ### Task List - title: [Question] <About the improvement suggestion of the alarm function>
body:
### Question

在生产环境使用中，告警信息会出现以下情况：

1. 监控采集间隔时间为1小时，阈值触发次数限制为1，则触发后每小时都会发送一次告警，但某些告警无需立刻处理，例如SSL证书过期天数剩下几天时，只需每天对运维人员发送一次警告即可，这种情况就只能增加采集间隔或触发次数去避免重复发送

2. 告警恢复的信息内容无法自定义，而且内容是直接贴上阈值的判断式，非HertzBeat运维人员并不清楚

3. 在使用中出现了某些告警触发了阈值但ErrMsg内容属于正常的情况，单纯的阈值无法判断，时间静默无法排除

综上所述，建议添加以下功能：
1. 告警次数限制   2. 告警恢复信息内容自定义 3. 告警内容关键词静默

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

In the production environment, the alarm information will appear in the following situations:

1. If the monitoring collection interval is 1 hour and the number of threshold triggers is limited to 1, an alarm will be sent every hour after triggering, but some alarms do not need to be processed immediately. It is enough for the operation and maintenance personnel to send a warning once. In this case, the collection interval or the number of triggers can only be increased to avoid repeated sending

2. The content of the alarm recovery information cannot be customized, and the content is a judgment formula directly pasted with the threshold value, which is not clear to non-HertzBeat operation and maintenance personnel

3. In use, some alarms trigger the threshold but the content of ErrMsg is normal. The simple threshold cannot be judged, and the time silence cannot be ruled out.

In summary, it is recommended to add the following features:
1. Limit the number of alarms 2. Customize the content of the alarm recovery information 3. Silence the keywords of the alarm content

title: [Question] It is recommended to add resources to add devices through ip segments or subnets <title>
body:
### Question

现在很多服务器、设备属于同一个ip段，通过导入导出还是比较麻烦，建议增加可以通过ip段或者子网添加设备，增加软件的易用性。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Now many servers and devices belong to the same ip segment, and it is still troublesome to import and export. It is recommended to add devices through the ip segment or subnet to increase the ease of use of the software.

title: [BUG] Upgrade to latest (1.4.0) and report an error, which can be reproduced
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

如果使用https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/blob/master/README_CN.md 说的命令`docker run -d -p 1157:1157 -p 1158:1158 --name hertzbeat tancloud/hertzbeat`是可以的，但是只要带上`--volume=`，比如`--volume=/opt/heartzbeat/config/application.yml:/opt/hertzbeat/config/application.yml`，就会启动报错。

```
***************************
APPLICATION FAILED TO START
***************************

Description:

Parameter 2 of constructor in org.dromara.hertzbeat.alert.reduce.AlarmCommonReduce required a single bean, but 2 were found:
	- nettyDataQueue: defined in URL [jar:file:/opt/hertzbeat/lib/hertzbeat-collector-1.0.jar!/org/dromara/hertzbeat/collector/dispatch/export/NettyDataQueue.class]
	- inMemoryCommonDataQueue: defined in URL [jar:file:/opt/hertzbeat/lib/hertzbeat-common-1.0.jar!/org/dromara/hertzbeat/common/queue/impl/InMemoryCommonDataQueue.class]


Action:

Consider marking one of the beans as @Primary, updating the consumer to accept multiple beans, or using @Qualifier to identify the bean that should be consumed

```

没有用任何单独的数据库，仅仅是使用docker run命令，这是我的启动命令
```
docker run --name=hertzbeat \
	--env=LANG=zh_CN.UTF-8 \
	--volume=/opt/heartzbeat/data:/opt/hertzbeat/data \
	--volume=/opt/heartzbeat/logs:/opt/hertzbeat/logs \
	--volume=/opt/heartzbeat/config/application.yml:/opt/hertzbeat/config/application.yml \
	--workdir=/opt/hertzbeat \
	-p 1157:1157 \
	--restart=always \
	tancloud/hertzbeat
```

之前用1.3.0是好的

### Expected Behavior

期待如1.3.0那样使用上述启动命令能够正常启动

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(s):1.4.0
System versioin：Ubuntu 18.04
```

title: [Task] <add collector mode: cluster public, cloud-edge private>
body:
### Description

- add collector mode: cluster public, cloud-edge private

the cluster collector should has two running mode: cluster public, cloud-edge private

- cluster public. In this mode, the collector cluster may undertake all collection tasks that are not specified.
- cloud-edge private. In this mode, the collector can be designated to undertake a certain monitoring collection task, but cannot undertake non-designated tasks.

### Task List

_No response_

![WechatIMG515](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/4798540/bdb7b598-6ffb-433c-9213-76869e7ee6a1)

title: [Question] <title>Alarm convergence function abnormality
body:
### Question

我设置告警收敛时间3分钟，测试“端口告警可用性”时，我下掉端口服务触发阈值并收到告警信息，间隔几秒，我上线端口服务此时收到告警恢复信息。间隔几秒，当我再次下掉端口服务时，没有收到告警信息。
发现如下几个问题：
（1）我看了下“告警中心”，没有最后一次下掉服务的告警记录。
（2）“端口可用性”栏目中，已经下掉的服务监控状态仍然是“正常监控”，但是打开该项监控图表，自下掉服务那段时间并没有数据。
（3）当我再上线该服务，图标数据正常生成，但是也没有收到恢复信息，告警中心也没有记录。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

I set the alarm convergence time to 3 minutes. When testing "port alarm availability", I lowered the trigger threshold of the port service and received an alarm message. After a few seconds, I brought the port service online and received the alarm recovery message. After a few seconds, when I disconnected the port service again, I did not receive an alarm message.
The following issues were found:
(1) I checked the "Alarm Center" and there is no alarm record of the last time the service was disconnected.
(2) In the "Port Availability" column, the monitoring status of the service that has been removed is still "Normal Monitoring", but when you open the monitoring chart, there is no data since the service was removed.
(3) When I went online with the service, the icon data was generated normally, but no recovery information was received, and there was no record in the alarm center.

body:
## 接入第三方告警API的代码重构 ### 一、现存编码的问题 #### 1、Controller层通用性比较差 如下图 ![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/474490d7-f2dc-4a45-9e3a-5732d79ff1f2) 假设我们需要进行增加一个阿里云的API，我们需要写一个跟这个腾讯云API差不多的方法，调用方法的结构也是大同小异，不同之处只有`alertConvertTenCloudService.convert(alertReport)`这一处，这样的写法有些赘余，需要进行优化。 #### 2、Service层的功能不明确 如下图 ![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/6a2c6e6b-796e-4d01-b7d3-b53c32389a1f) `Service`是进行业务处理的，但是在这个`Service`类的方法只提供了一个`String`转`对应的API的BO实体`的功能，并不是那么符合Service层的定义，需要进行优化。 ### 二、优化的方案 #### 1、关于问题1，提出以下解决方案 我们的目标是提高接口的复用性，那么首先第一个步就是，我们需要使用一个接口方法来承接不同第三方API的请求，所以我们需要进行对来源的判断。
方案 描述 灵活性 用户体验 开发成本
方案一 提供一个泛化接口，通过调用信息进行判断来源，比如说，HTTP协议里面的Origin字段，或者请求的消息内容中包含对应的类似字段 强依赖于提供方的请求去判断来源，灵活性比较欠缺 体验良好，无需根据对应的云服务去做API的区分 开发成本不大，但是需要去找更多请求信息，同时未必能实现
方案二 提供一个接口，使用RESTAPI中的占位符URL，可以获取到请求来源 灵活，来源判断只依赖于具体使用时的设置，代码层面上也比较灵活，无需重复定义类似的API 体验一般，因为无法自动识别云端进行适配，还需要用户去看文档了解应该使用哪一个API 开发成本低，只需要增加一下类型判断即可
方案二优 方案一优 方案二优
综合考虑，暂选择方案二。 #### 2、关于问题2，提出以下解决方案 由于该Service功能不明显，所以以下方案提出的基础在于，取消该Service，并考虑将该转换能力放置在何处。
方案 描述 合理性 开发成本
方案一 将转换能力独立出来，作为convert包，该包的能力为将request请求包装为BO 对于结构来说，比较合理，因为转换是一个独立的能力，独立出一个单独的包，可以使用一些类的功能更加清晰，但是考虑到目前项目结构下，并没有类似的包，如果此时独立，会导致转换能力散落在项目多个包下，不便于管理 如果不考虑将历史转换能力进行收敛，那么开发成本较小
方案二 由于最终结果是将一个String对象转换为一个BO对象，所以我们可以给BO增加对应的构造器方法 构造器可以承担该部分的功能，同时将生成对象的能力或者说转换对象的能力收敛到BO中，在没有将转换能力独立出来的时候，是一个不错的考虑，类的功能更加明确 开发成本小
方案二优 方案二优
综上考虑，暂使用方案二。 ### 三、优化的具体细节 由于接口的占位符的字符串与对应的BO实体有强依赖关系，所以可以使用枚举进行强制绑定，也方便进行类型校验，同时如果用户使用API类型错误的话，还可以给用户发送消息，提示某某API使用错误，正确的API有xxx、xxx，进一步让用户更方便使用。

body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿 ---- ## Code reconstruction for accessing third-party alarm API ### 1. Problems with existing coding #### 1. The Controller layer has poor versatility As shown below ![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/474490d7-f2dc-4a45-9e3a-5732d79ff1f2) Suppose we need to add an Alibaba Cloud API. We need to write a method similar to the Tencent Cloud API. The structure of the calling method is also similar. The only difference is `alertConvertTenCloudService.convert(alertReport)`, which is written like this Some are redundant and need to be optimized. #### 2. The function of the Service layer is unclear As shown below ![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/6a2c6e6b-796e-4d01-b7d3-b53c32389a1f) `Service` is for business processing, but the method in this `Service` class only provides a function of converting `String` to `BO entity` of the corresponding API, which is not in line with the definition of the Service layer and needs to be optimized. ### 2. Optimization plan #### 1. Regarding question 1, the following solutions are proposed Our goal is to improve the reusability of the interface, so the first step is that we need to use an interface method to accept requests from different third-party APIs, so we need to judge the source.
Plan Description Flexibility User experience Development costs
Option 1 Provides a generalized interface to determine the source by calling information, for example, the Origin field in the HTTP protocol, or the requested message content contains corresponding similar fields Strongly dependent on the provider's request to determine the source, lack of flexibility The experience is good and there is no need to distinguish APIs based on the corresponding cloud services The development cost is not high, but you need to find more request information, which may not be possible at the same time
Option 2 Provide an interface to obtain the request source using the placeholder URL in REST API Flexible, source judgment only depends on the specific settings when used, and it is also flexible at the code level, without the need to repeatedly define similar APIs The experience is average, because it cannot automatically identify the cloud for adaptation, and users need to read the documentation to understand which API should be used The development cost is low, just need to add type judgment
The second best option The best plan The second best option
After comprehensive consideration, we temporarily choose option two. #### 2. Regarding question 2, the following solutions are proposed Since the function of this Service is not obvious, the basis for the following proposal is to cancel the Service and consider where to place the conversion capability. The
Plan Description Reasonability Development costs
Option 1 Isolate the conversion capability as a convert package. The ability of this package is to package the request request into BO In terms of structure, it is more reasonable, because conversion is an independent capability, and a separate package can be used to make the functions of some classes clearer. However, considering the current project structure, there is no similar package. If Being independent at this time will cause the conversion capabilities to be scattered under multiple packages of the project, making it inconvenient to manage If the convergence of historical conversion capabilities is not considered, the development cost will be smaller
Option 2 Since the final result is to convert a String object into a BO object, we can add the corresponding constructor method to BO constructor can assume this part of the function, and at the same time converge the ability to generate objects or convert objects into BO. This is a good consideration when the conversion ability is not separated, and the functions of the class are more clear. Low development cost
The second best option The second best option
Based on the above considerations, option 2 is temporarily used. ### 3. Specific details of optimization Since the placeholder string of the interface has a strong dependency on the corresponding BO entity, enumeration can be used for forced binding, which is also convenient for type verification. At the same time, if the user uses the wrong API type, it can also be sent to the user. The message indicates that a certain API is used incorrectly. The correct APIs are xxx and xxx, further making it easier for users to use.

body:
> LGTM👍，问题一：方案二+1，问题二：方案二+1 我们接收请求对象然后convert转换实体属性那块，能不能直接使用@JsonProperty类似这样的注解转换成实体属性哦
> 
> ```
> @JsonProperty("msg_type")
> private String msgType 
> ```

以下注解属于jackson，使用的使用需要新建一个`ObjectMapper`对象进行转换，观感上不够简洁
```Java
@JsonProperty("msg_type")
private String msgType;
```

找了fastjson，也有类似的注解（如下），使用方式依旧是`JSON.parseObject()`的静态方法，比较喜欢这种方式
```Java
@JSONField(name = "id")
private String id;
```

我想使用一下第二种方式，不过项目中是否有要求需要统一使用某种转换方式呢，另外这两种方式都会创建一个新的实体对象，这样直接放在BO里面倒是看起来怪怪的，因为该方法不是静态方法，只是BO的一个能力，所以不太应该出现这种BO里面新建一个BO对象的情况，而是应该填充属性。

解决思路：第一种是通过BeanUtil，可以将生成的新的对象复制到this对象中，第二种是看看有没有别的工具可以进行属性映射填充而不需要生成新对象。

后续我去实际编码测试一下这处的实现细节有没有问题:smile:

> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
> LGTM👍, Question 1: Option 2 + 1, Question 2: Option 2 + 1 We receive the request object and then convert the entity attributes. Can we directly use @JsonProperty annotations like this to convert into entity attributes?
>
> ```
> @JsonProperty("msg_type")
> private String msgType
> ```

The following annotations belong to jackson. To use them, you need to create a new `ObjectMapper` object for conversion, which is not simple enough in appearance.
```Java
@JsonProperty("msg_type")
private String msgType;
```

I found fastjson and there are similar annotations (as follows). The usage method is still the static method of `JSON.parseObject()`. I prefer this method.
```Java
@JSONField(name = "id")
private String id;
```

I want to use the second method, but is there a requirement in the project to use a certain conversion method? In addition, these two methods will create a new entity object, so it seems strange to put it directly in BO. Because this method is not a static method, but is just a capability of BO, it is unlikely that a new BO object will be created in BO. Instead, the properties should be filled in.

Solution: The first is to copy the generated new object into this object through BeanUtil. The second is to see if there are other tools that can fill in attribute mapping without generating new objects.

Later, I will go to the actual coding to test whether there are any problems with the implementation details here: smile:

body:
## 优化1.0

### 枚举：

原项目没有枚举的包，我这里新建了一个：

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/ef91fc4e-5399-4979-a990-ff5db02cce03)

**CloudServiceAlarmInformationEnum**：

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/582ae0eb-4a8d-4693-92f1-802fbcc297b1)

枚举这里将告警信息实体的Class与对应的云服务名称（URL中占位符）进行绑定，枚举获取是遍历方式的，虽然也可以不写枚举，直接用Map去做类似的操作，但是由于枚举类型不多，也并不耗时，所以使用枚举去获取，更便于代码管理一点

### DTO改造：

改造思路：由于JSON字符串最终是修改为`AlertReport`这个实体，实际上需要先将JSON字符串转为对应的云服务告警实体，再由云服务告警实体转为`AlertReport`这个实体，由于第一个转换只需要使用JSONUtil一行代码即可，所以放弃了原来设计文档中把这个转换能力收敛到云服务告警实体中的想法，因为那样需要多创建一个对象，不够合理，现在改为在控制层进行转换。

还需要处理的地方在于云服务告警实体如何转换为`AlertReport`实体，由于`AlertReport`实体参数是基本固定的，而`AlertReport`的属性可以由云服务告警实体中的属性得出，所以我们可以将`AlertReport`的属性看为云服务告警实体的虚拟属性，把获取虚拟属性的能力收敛到云服务告警实体中，这样，我们就可以使用模板方法来进行改造。

**CloudAlertReportAbstract（抽象父类）**：
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/2ef89e41-cfa8-4b2f-a0d8-41b4c519b224)

代码解释：
1. 所有的云服务告警实体都需要继承该抽象类并实现对应的抽象方法
2. 该抽象类的抽象方法与`AlertReport`的属性有强关联关系，已使用@link标注
3. 使用@JsonIgnore是因为jackson是通过getXxx()方法获取对象的序列化内容的，导致虚拟属性也被获取到，所以做一下过滤
4. 抛异常是因为里面有一个日期格式的转换，需要抛一个格式异常，然后我干脆全部抛一下，看起来整齐一点

**实现类举例**：
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/e1c5e5ad-e41a-4b47-98b5-b045b4656994)

需要实现父类的抽象方法，关于里面的一些可以商讨的点：
1. 有一些字符串或者数字，我是直接写上去了，并没有定义常量，如果是在类里面直接定义这些常量，不太符合云服务告警实体的语义，然后也没有在这个模块找到专门写静态变量的类，所以就暂时这样写一下。

### 控制层的改造：

只是使用枚举进行了一下校验，后面进行模板填充了一下，顺便优化了一下日志打印和原先的一个解析失败似乎还会进行一个空告警的小问题

代码：

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/a82151f3-7ec7-457c-b775-7eb841a982b7)

还有一些商讨的地方：
1. 我想给API使用错误的用户一个告警，也走了这个第三方告警的通道，但是这个信息，我暂时只是简单定义了一下，应该需要更改一下

### 测试：

根据之前的测试类小小改了一下，然后debug了一下，构造出来的信息模板与之前一致

测试代码：

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/3b0091e7-4af7-4f8c-8d87-72beebfafbab)


### 改造后如何接入一款新的云服务告警

1. 创建对应云服务的告警实体，并继承`CloudAlertReportAbstract`这个抽象类
2. 在`CloudServiceAlarmInformationEnum`里面增加一个枚举类型

然后就可以了

各位看看哪里还需要修改一下呢:grin:

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
## Optimization 1.0

### Enumeration:

The original project does not have enumerated packages, so I created a new one here:

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/ef91fc4e-5399-4979-a990-ff5db02cce03)

**CloudServiceAlarmInformationEnum**:

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/582ae0eb-4a8d-4693-92f1-802fbcc297b1)

Enumeration here binds the Class of the alarm information entity with the corresponding cloud service name (placeholder in the URL). The enumeration is obtained through traversal. Although you can also directly use Map to perform similar operations without writing the enumeration. , but since there are not many enumeration types and it is not time-consuming, using enumeration to obtain it is more convenient for code management.

### DTO transformation:

Transformation idea: Since the JSON string is eventually modified into the entity `AlertReport`, it is actually necessary to convert the JSON string into the corresponding cloud service alarm entity first, and then convert the cloud service alarm entity into the entity `AlertReport`. A conversion only requires one line of code using JSONUtil, so I gave up the idea of ​​converging this conversion capability into the cloud service alarm entity in the original design document, because that would require the creation of one more object, which was not reasonable. Now it is changed to the control layer. Make the conversion.

What still needs to be processed is how to convert the cloud service alarm entity into an `AlertReport` entity. Since the `AlertReport` entity parameters are basically fixed, and the properties of `AlertReport` can be derived from the attributes in the cloud service alarm entity, so we can Consider the attributes of `AlertReport` as virtual attributes of the cloud service alarm entity, and integrate the ability to obtain virtual attributes into the cloud service alarm entity. In this way, we can use the template method to carry out transformation.

**CloudAlertReportAbstract (abstract parent class)**:
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/2ef89e41-cfa8-4b2f-a0d8-41b4c519b224)

Code explanation:
1. All cloud service alarm entities need to inherit this abstract class and implement the corresponding abstract method
2. The abstract method of this abstract class has a strong relationship with the properties of `AlertReport` and has been annotated with @link
3. Use @JsonIgnore because jackson obtains the serialized content of the object through the getXxx() method, resulting in virtual attributes also being obtained, so do some filtering
4. The exception is thrown because there is a date format conversion, and a format exception needs to be thrown. Then I just throw them all to make it look neater.

**Implementation class example**:
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/e1c5e5ad-e41a-4b47-98b5-b045b4656994)

It is necessary to implement the abstract method of the parent class. There are some points that can be discussed:
1. There are some strings or numbers, but I wrote them directly without defining constants. If these constants are directly defined in the class, it does not conform to the semantics of the cloud service alarm entity, and I have not found any specifically written strings or numbers in this module. The class of static variables, so let’s write it like this for the time being.

### Transformation of control layer:

I just used enumeration for verification, and then filled in the template. By the way, I optimized the log printing and the original parsing failure seemed to cause an empty alarm.

Code:

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/a82151f3-7ec7-457c-b775-7eb841a982b7)

There are some areas for discussion:
1. I want to give an alert to users who use the API incorrectly, and I also use the third-party alert channel. However, I have only briefly defined this information for the time being, and it should be changed.

### test:

I made a slight modification based on the previous test class, and then debugged it. The constructed information template is consistent with the previous one.

Test code:

![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/91116490/3b0091e7-4af7-4f8c-8d87-72beebfafbab)


### How to access a new cloud service alarm after transformation

1. Create an alarm entity corresponding to the cloud service and inherit the abstract class `CloudAlertReportAbstract`
2. Add an enumeration type in `CloudServiceAlarmInformationEnum`

Then it's ok

Please take a look at where you still need to modify it: grin:

Idea 1: Static resources in the runtime state can not change the root path of the route of a specific request, my idea is to compile and package the front-end project through the maven plugin of manager-web to compile and combine the front-end project together, does not support the runtime state adjustment.
Idea 2 (not recommended): In the runtime state,  get the configuration of the backend dynamically, combined with angular interceptor mechanism to intercept & change.

We can discuss it .

title: NA
body:
hi bro, thanks for taking the time to think about this.💗 For idea 1, the users maybe not know how to complie and build code, most of them use the release package. Recommend to change it at runtime through configuration if possible.

I mistakenly thought it was simple. The root path `/` of the static resource `index.html` is a trouble. Change this will cause many resource paths to not be found. For idea 2, it's a solution if it works in theory, but it will take up a lot of your time?

title: v1.4.2 docker version history indicator query cannot find indicator records for more than 1 day
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

检查该监控对应TDengine数据库表，发现近7天的数据是存在的，但是页面上查询不出来。
![1](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/4798540/4bdeba7d-7380-4fa5-b2d6-93cc467aaf6b)

![2](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/4798540/6226b5e3-1e53-4545-97f0-b6cf9feadfbc)


### Expected Behavior

能查询1天以上的数据并显示出来

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(s):v1.4.2
```


### Debug logs

日志无报错

### Anything else?

_No response_

title: NA
body:
因为tdengine的处理SQL在 1.4.2 版本更新了下，导致之前的数据查询不到

```
INSERT_TABLE_DATA_SQL = "INSERT INTO %s USING %s TAGS (%s) VALUES %s"

"SELECT ts, instance, `%s` FROM %s WHERE instance = '%s' AND ts >= now - %s order by ts desc"
```
变更为 
```
INSERT_TABLE_DATA_SQL = "INSERT INTO `%s` USING `%s` TAGS (%s) VALUES %s";

"SELECT ts, instance, `%s` FROM `%s` WHERE instance = '%s' AND ts >= now - %s order by ts desc"
```

现在`%s` 修饰了表名，这样有可能之前建的表不识别, 建议手动修改老表

title: [Question] <title>The format of the alarmId value in the alarm message is incorrect and the message cannot be sent.
body:
### Question

我在使用最新版本（v1.4.2）测试告警时发现个问题，我使用的webhook接口，钉钉无法收到告警信息。排查如下：
查看webhook服务的log，发现告警信息确实可以收到，但是信息中alarmId数值不对，如：alarmId：2,104，正确格式应该是2104。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

I found a problem when using the latest version (v1.4.2) to test the alarm. The webhook interface I used, DingTalk could not receive the alarm information. The troubleshooting is as follows:
Check the log of the webhook service and find that the alarm information can indeed be received, but the alarmId value in the information is incorrect, such as: alarmId: 2,104. The correct format should be 2104.

monitoring nginx metrics eg: requests number, accepts number, handled number, qps, error and more. 

suggest use nginx itself `ngx_http_stub_status_module`, and we collect metrics from this moudle `ngx_http_stub_status_module` export staus page `http://localhost/nginx-status`

relate links:

https://www.tecmint.com/enable-nginx-status-page/
https://ubiq.co/tech-blog/how-to-enable-nginx-status-page/ 

### Task List

- [ ] support monitoring nginx server metrics
- [ ] nginx monitoring help document

title: [Task] <support diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 and more KEX algorithms for ssh connect>
body:
### Description

ssh collect when peer server has old KEX algorithms, error happen
```
Unable to negotiate key exchange for KEX algorithms (client: ecdh-sha2-nistp521,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group18-sha512,diffie-hellman-group17-sha512,diffie-hellman-group16-sha512,diffie-hellman-group15-sha512,diffie-hellman-group14-sha256 / server: diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1
```
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/66986656/mina-sshd-enable-kex-with-sha1-in-version-2-6-0 

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/77143594/spring-integration-sftp-connection-fails-unable-to-negotiate-key-exchange-for


### Task List

- [ ] support diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 and more KEX algorithms for ssh connect

Hi, Tom. I have some questions to be confirmed. Yesterday I've found two ways to monitor dns server.

1. Use commands to dns server, and collect data which dns server response.
https://www.cnblogs.com/pengdai/p/16570903.html#_label2_0
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2008-R2-and-2008/dd197470(v=ws.10)#dns-query-message-format

I also code a demo for this, here's the output result: 
![image](https://github.com/dromara/hertzbeat/assets/131688897/8fba97a5-533b-4786-8157-edff99734b41)


2. Collecting data like how `Prometheus` do
https://github.com/prometheus-community/bind_exporter
https://computingforgeeks.com/monitor-bind-dns-server-with-prometheus-grafana/
Run a script on dns server, then interact with it. In my opinion, it seems doesn't fit hertzbeat's feature - `Easy to use and agentless`

Should I use the first way to monitor dns server? Or do you have any better suggestion? 
@tomsun28

title: [Task] The problem of alarm triggering and recovery time in the same alarm information
body: ### Question 我在使用HertzBeat中发现如下问题： 当前模板无论是触发告警还是恢复告警，都只是给出一个时间，这个有时候根本不知道哪个是哪个几点触发的。我希望同一个告警触发和恢复时间做个关联，这样当一个告警信息发出时，信息中会显示此告警触发的时间，当这个告警恢复时，信息中应显示此告警触发和恢复的时间，便于使用者更好区分不同时段的告警信息（如附件所显示的）。附件中是我使用prometheus时收到的告警恢复信息：

title: NA
body: > Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿 ---- ### Question I found the following problems when using HertzBeat: Whether the current template triggers an alarm or restores an alarm, it only gives a time. Sometimes it is impossible to know which one was triggered at which time. I want to associate the triggering and recovery time of the same alarm, so that when an alarm message is sent, the message will display the time when the alarm was triggered. When the alarm is restored, the message should display the time when the alarm was triggered and restored, which is convenient. Users can better distinguish alarm information in different time periods (as shown in the attachment). Attached is the alarm recovery information I received when using prometheus:

title: How to add a link to a Linux server logged in using pem key
body: ### Question

title: NA
body:
hi there are two way to login with key. 

- use the private key in webui 
- generate a key pair under the host or docker where hertzbeat is deployed, and put its public key in the secret `authorized_keys` authentication of the monitoring target host. ```cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys```

title: NA
body: hi 可用性告警是系统内置强需要的，如果重启系统发现没有一条这个监控类型对应的可用性告警，会自动生成一条，如果存在或者修改则不会。如果确实不想用这条阈值，可以不启用来关闭他。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
hi Availability alarms are a strong requirement built into the system. If you restart the system and find that there is no availability alarm corresponding to this monitoring type, it will automatically generate one. If it exists or is modified, it will not. If you really don't want to use this threshold, you can disable it by disabling it.

title: [BUG] <title>The IP addresses displayed by the collector on the server side are all container IPs. It is more reasonable to display the system IP where the collector is located.
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current Behavior

采集器在服务器端显示的IP地址都是容器IP：172.17.0.2。

### Expected Behavior

应该显示采集器所在操作系统的IP更为合理。

### Steps To Reproduce

无

### Environment

```markdown
HertzBeat version(s):1.4.1
```


### Debug logs

无

### Anything else?

无

title: NA
body: 这个问题应该是属于Docker的范围，因为容器在运行时，Docker会给容器单独创建一个网络环境，如果想要采集器（即容器）显示为宿主机IP地址，需要将容器的 network mode 设定为 host 模式。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
This problem should be within the scope of Docker, because when the container is running, Docker will create a separate network environment for the container. If you want the collector (i.e. container) to be displayed as the host IP address, you need to set the network mode of the container to host mode.

title: [Question] Remote ssh server no more session channel, please increase sshd_config MaxSessions
body:
### Question

centos服务器监控，运行了有一段时间了，最近突然报这个错误，并且监控显示【不可用】，但是通过ssh方式连接服务器是没有问题的。
后来调整hertzbeat的配置【复用连接】，将其关闭，现在又变得好使了。
请问这个【复用连接】的作用是什么。

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
### Question

Centos server monitoring has been running for a while. Recently, this error suddenly reported, and the monitoring showed [Unavailable], but there is no problem connecting to the server through ssh.
Later, I adjusted the configuration of hertzbeat [Reuse Connection] and turned it off, and now it works fine again.
What is the function of this [reuse connection]?

title: NA
body: 【复用连接】就是一直复用保持一个ssh tcp链接，但是长时间运行在某些环境有可能server因为其它原因断开保持 但是client没有察觉 导致出链接失败的现象

title: NA
body:
> Bot detected the issue body's language is not English, translate it automatically. 👯👭🏻🧑‍🤝‍🧑👫🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏻👩🏾‍🤝‍👨🏿👬🏿         
----    
[Reuse connection] is to reuse and maintain an ssh tcp link. However, if it runs for a long time in some environments, the server may be disconnected due to other reasons, but the client is not aware of it, resulting in a link failure.

title: NA
body:
We had the same problem in our environment, even after turning off the "Reuse connection" option, we still couldn't connect, and restarting the target server's sshd service didn't work, but only after restarting hertzbeat could we connect!
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f8a78c3c-f3e9-48ff-bec4-ae7e24dfea52)

title: NA
body: Got it, we will follow
